  1505→    @staticmethod
  1506→    async def increment_trial_usage(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> int:
  1507→        """增加试用次数，返回新的使用次数"""
  1508→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1509→        if not profile:
  1510→            profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(user_id)
  1511→
  1512→        subscribed_skills = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("subscribed_skills", {})
  1513→        existing = subscribed_skills.get(skill_id, {
  1514→            "status": "not_subscribed",
  1515→            "push_enabled": False,
  1516→            "subscribed_at": None,
  1517→            "unsubscribed_at": None,
  1518→            "trial_messages_used": 0,
  1519→        })
  1520→
  1521→        existing["trial_messages_used"] = existing.get("trial_messages_used", 0) + 1
  1522→        subscribed_skills[skill_id] = existing
  1523→
  1524→        await execute(
  1525→            """UPDATE unified_profiles
  1526→               SET profile = jsonb_set(
  1527→                   jsonb_set(
  1528→                       COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
  1529→                       '{preferences}',
  1530→                       COALESCE(profile -> 'preferences', '{}'::jsonb)
  1531→                   ),
  1532→                   '{preferences, subscribed_skills}',
  1533→                   $2::jsonb
  1534→               ),
  1535→               updated_at = NOW()
  1536→               WHERE user_id = $1""",
  1537→            user_id, json.dumps(subscribed_skills, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
  1538→        )
  1539→
  1540→        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)
  1541→        return existing["trial_messages_used"]
  1542→
  1543→    @staticmethod
  1544→    async def get_trial_usage(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> int:
  1545→        """获取试用次数"""
  1546→        subscription = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_subscription(user_id, skill_id)
  1547→        return subscription.trial_messages_used if subscription else 0
  1548→
  1549→    @staticmethod
  1550→    async def is_subscribed(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> bool:
  1551→        """检查是否已订阅"""
  1552→        subscription = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_subscription(user_id, skill_id)
  1553→        return subscription is not None and subscription.status == "subscribed"
  1554→
  1555→    @staticmethod
  1556→    async def can_use_skill(
  1557→        user_id: UUID,
  1558→        skill_id: str,
  1559→        skill_category: str,
  1560→        trial_limit: int = 3
  1561→    ) -> tuple:
  1562→        """
  1563→        检查用户是否可以使用 Skill
  1564→
  1565→        Returns:
  1566→            (can_use, reason)
  1567→            - (True, "subscribed") - 已订阅
  1568→            - (True, "default") - 默认 Skill
  1569→            - (True, "core") - Core Skill
  1570→            - (True, "trial") - 试用中
  1571→            - (False, "trial_exhausted") - 试用次数用完
  1572→            - (False, "not_subscribed") - 未订阅
  1573→        """
  1574→        # Core Skill 始终可用
  1575→        if skill_category == "core":
  1576→            return True, "core"
  1577→
  1578→        subscription = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_subscription(user_id, skill_id)
  1579→
  1580→        # Default Skill: 如果没有订阅记录或已订阅，则可用
  1581→        if skill_category == "default":
  1582→            if not subscription or subscription.status == "subscribed":
  1583→                return True, "default"
  1584→            return False, "unsubscribed"
  1585→
  1586→        # Professional Skill: 需要订阅或在试用期内
  1587→        if subscription and subscription.status == "subscribed":
  1588→            return True, "subscribed"
  1589→
  1590→        # 检查试用
  1591→        trial_used = subscription.trial_messages_used if subscription else 0
  1592→        if trial_used < trial_limit:
  1593→            return True, "trial"
  1594→
  1595→        return False, "trial_exhausted"
  1596→
  1597→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1598→    # 推送偏好管理 (v7.6 - 从 UserPushPreferencesRepository 迁移)
  1599→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1600→
  1601→    @staticmethod
  1602→    async def get_push_settings(user_id: UUID) -> Optional[UserPushPreferences]:
  1603→        """获取用户推送偏好"""
  1604→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1605→        if not profile:
  1606→            return None
  1607→
  1608→        push_settings = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("push_settings", {})
  1609→        if not push_settings:
  1610→            return None
  1611→
  1612→        return UserPushPreferences(
  1613→            user_id=user_id,
  1614→            default_push_hour=push_settings.get("default_push_hour", 8),
  1615→            max_daily_pushes=push_settings.get("max_daily_pushes", 5),
  1616→            quiet_start_hour=push_settings.get("quiet_start_hour", 22),
  1617→            quiet_end_hour=push_settings.get("quiet_end_hour", 7),
  1618→        )
  1619→
  1620→    @staticmethod
  1621→    async def upsert_push_settings(
  1622→        user_id: UUID,
  1623→        default_push_hour: Optional[int] = None,
  1624→        max_daily_pushes: Optional[int] = None,
  1625→        quiet_start_hour: Optional[int] = None,
  1626→        quiet_end_hour: Optional[int] = None,
  1627→    ) -> UserPushPreferences:
  1628→        """创建或更新用户推送偏好"""
  1629→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1630→        if not profile:
  1631→            profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(user_id)
  1632→
  1633→        current_settings = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("push_settings", {})
  1634→        push_settings = {
  1635→            "default_push_hour": default_push_hour if default_push_hour is not None else current_settings.get("default_push_hour", 8),
  1636→            "max_daily_pushes": max_daily_pushes if max_daily_pushes is not None else current_settings.get("max_daily_pushes", 5),
  1637→            "quiet_start_hour": quiet_start_hour if quiet_start_hour is not None else current_settings.get("quiet_start_hour", 22),
  1638→            "quiet_end_hour": quiet_end_hour if quiet_end_hour is not None else current_settings.get("quiet_end_hour", 7),
  1639→        }
  1640→
  1641→        await execute(
  1642→            """UPDATE unified_profiles
  1643→               SET profile = jsonb_set(
  1644→                   jsonb_set(
  1645→                       COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
  1646→                       '{preferences}',
  1647→                       COALESCE(profile -> 'preferences', '{}'::jsonb)
  1648→                   ),
  1649→                   '{preferences, push_settings}',
  1650→                   $2::jsonb
  1651→               ),
  1652→               updated_at = NOW()
  1653→               WHERE user_id = $1""",
  1654→            user_id, json.dumps(push_settings, ensure_ascii=False)
  1655→        )
  1656→
  1657→        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)
  1658→
  1659→        return UserPushPreferences(
  1660→            user_id=user_id,
  1661→            default_push_hour=push_settings["default_push_hour"],
  1662→            max_daily_pushes=push_settings["max_daily_pushes"],
  1663→            quiet_start_hour=push_settings["quiet_start_hour"],
  1664→            quiet_end_hour=push_settings["quiet_end_hour"],
  1665→        )
  1666→
  1667→    @staticmethod
  1668→    async def get_push_hour(user_id: UUID, skill_id: Optional[str] = None) -> int:
  1669→        """
  1670→        获取用户的推送时间
  1671→
  1672→        优先级:
  1673→        1. 用户全局偏好 (preferences.push_settings.default_push_hour)
  1674→        2. 系统默认值 (8)
  1675→        """
  1676→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1677→        if profile:
  1678→            push_settings = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("push_settings", {})
  1679→            if "default_push_hour" in push_settings:
  1680→                return push_settings["default_push_hour"]
  1681→        return 8
  1682→
  1683→    @staticmethod
  1684→    async def is_in_quiet_hours(user_id: UUID, current_hour: int) -> bool:
  1685→        """检查当前是否在用户的静默时段"""
  1686→        prefs = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_push_settings(user_id)
  1687→        if not prefs:
  1688→            # 默认静默时段 22:00 - 07:00
  1689→            return current_hour >= 22 or current_hour < 7
  1690→
  1691→        start = prefs.quiet_start_hour
  1692→        end = prefs.quiet_end_hour
  1693→
  1694→        # 处理跨午夜的情况
  1695→        if start > end:
  1696→            return current_hour >= start or current_hour < end
  1697→        else:
  1698→            return start <= current_hour < end
  1699→
  1700→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1701→    # Skill 推荐屏蔽 (v7.6 - 从 SkillRecommendationBlockRepository 迁移)
  1702→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1703→
  1704→    @staticmethod
  1705→    async def get_blocked_skills(user_id: UUID) -> List[str]:
  1706→        """获取用户屏蔽的 Skill 列表"""
  1707→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1708→        if not profile:
  1709→            return []
  1710→        return profile.get("preferences", {}).get("blocked_skills", [])
  1711→
  1712→    @staticmethod
  1713→    async def block_skill(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> None:
  1714→        """屏蔽 Skill 推荐"""
  1715→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1716→        if not profile:
  1717→            profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(user_id)
  1718→
  1719→        blocked_skills = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("blocked_skills", [])
  1720→        if skill_id not in blocked_skills:
  1721→            blocked_skills.append(skill_id)
  1722→
  1723→        await execute(
  1724→            """UPDATE unified_profiles
  1725→               SET profile = jsonb_set(
  1726→                   jsonb_set(
  1727→                       COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
  1728→                       '{preferences}',
  1729→                       COALESCE(profile -> 'preferences', '{}'::jsonb)
  1730→                   ),
  1731→                   '{preferences, blocked_skills}',
  1732→                   $2::jsonb
  1733→               ),
  1734→               updated_at = NOW()
  1735→               WHERE user_id = $1""",
  1736→            user_id, json.dumps(blocked_skills, ensure_ascii=False)
  1737→        )
  1738→
  1739→        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)
  1740→
  1741→    @staticmethod
  1742→    async def unblock_skill(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> None:
  1743→        """取消屏蔽 Skill 推荐"""
  1744→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1745→        if not profile:
  1746→            return
  1747→
  1748→        blocked_skills = profile.get("preferences", {}).get("blocked_skills", [])
  1749→        if skill_id in blocked_skills:
  1750→            blocked_skills.remove(skill_id)
  1751→
  1752→        await execute(
  1753→            """UPDATE unified_profiles
  1754→               SET profile = jsonb_set(
  1755→                   jsonb_set(
  1756→                       COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
  1757→                       '{preferences}',
  1758→                       COALESCE(profile -> 'preferences', '{}'::jsonb)
  1759→                   ),
  1760→                   '{preferences, blocked_skills}',
  1761→                   $2::jsonb
  1762→               ),
  1763→               updated_at = NOW()
  1764→               WHERE user_id = $1""",
  1765→            user_id, json.dumps(blocked_skills, ensure_ascii=False)
  1766→        )
  1767→
  1768→        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id)
  1769→
  1770→    @staticmethod
  1771→    async def is_skill_blocked(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> bool:
  1772→        """检查 Skill 是否被屏蔽"""
  1773→        blocked_skills = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_blocked_skills(user_id)
  1774→        return skill_id in blocked_skills
  1775→
  1776→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1777→    # Skill 状态管理 - REFACTOR_PLAN.md Phase 1
  1778→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1779→
  1780→    @staticmethod
  1781→    async def get_skill_state(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  1782→        """
  1783→        获取 Skill 状态
  1784→
  1785→        按照 REFACTOR_PLAN.md，所有 Skill 数据统一存储在 profile.skills.{skill_id}
  1786→
  1787→        Returns:
  1788→            skill 状态数据，如果不存在则返回空字典
  1789→        """
  1790→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1791→        if not profile:
  1792→            return {}
  1793→        return profile.get("skills", {}).get(skill_id, {})
  1794→
  1795→    @staticmethod
  1796→    async def update_skill_state(
  1797→        user_id: UUID,
  1798→        skill_id: str,
  1799→        section: str,
  1800→        data: Dict[str, Any]
  1801→    ) -> None:
  1802→        """
  1803→        更新 Skill 状态（深度合并）
  1804→
  1805→        使用 PostgreSQL || 操作符进行深度合并，不会覆盖未指定的字段
  1806→
  1807→        Args:
  1808→            user_id: 用户 ID
  1809→            skill_id: Skill ID
  1810→            section: 要更新的部分，如 "north_star"、"protocol"
  1811→            data: 要写入的数据
  1812→        """
  1813→        exists = await fetchval(
  1814→            "SELECT 1 FROM unified_profiles WHERE user_id = $1",
  1815→            user_id
  1816→        )
  1817→
  1818→        if exists:
  1819→            # 使用 jsonb_set + || 进行深度合并
  1820→            await execute(
  1821→                """UPDATE unified_profiles
  1822→                   SET profile = jsonb_set(
  1823→                       jsonb_set(
  1824→                           jsonb_set(
  1825→                               COALESCE(profile, '{}'::jsonb),
  1826→                               '{skills}',
  1827→                               COALESCE(profile -> 'skills', '{}'::jsonb)
  1828→                           ),
  1829→                           ARRAY['skills', $2::text],
  1830→                           COALESCE(profile -> 'skills' -> $2::text, '{}'::jsonb)
  1831→                       ),
  1832→                       ARRAY['skills', $2::text, $3::text],
  1833→                       COALESCE(profile -> 'skills' -> $2::text -> $3::text, '{}'::jsonb) || $4::jsonb
  1834→                   ),
  1835→                   updated_at = NOW()
  1836→                   WHERE user_id = $1""",
  1837→                user_id, skill_id, section, json.dumps(data, ensure_ascii=False, default=str)
  1838→            )
  1839→        else:
  1840→            # 创建新 profile
  1841→            await UnifiedProfileRepository.create_profile(
  1842→                user_id,
  1843→                {"skills": {skill_id: {section: data}}}
  1844→            )
  1845→
  1846→        # 失效缓存
  1847→        await UnifiedProfileRepository._invalidate_cache(user_id, skill_id)
  1848→
  1849→    @staticmethod
  1850→    async def append_to_skill_list(
  1851→        user_id: UUID,
  1852→        skill_id: str,
  1853→        path: str,
  1854→        entry: Dict[str, Any],
  1855→        max_items: int = 100
  1856→    ) -> None:
  1857→        """
  1858→        向 Skill 数据中的列表追加条目
  1859→
  1860→        Args:
  1861→            user_id: 用户 ID
  1862→            skill_id: Skill ID
  1863→            path: 列表路径，如 "journal" 或 "progress.milestones"
  1864→            entry: 要追加的条目
  1865→            max_items: 列表最大长度（超出则删除最旧的）
  1866→        """
  1867→        # 获取当前数据
  1868→        skill_data = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_skill_state(user_id, skill_id)
  1869→
  1870→        # 解析路径
  1871→        parts = path.split(".")
  1872→        current = skill_data
  1873→        for part in parts[:-1]:
  1874→            current = current.setdefault(part, {})
  1875→
  1876→        # 获取或创建列表
  1877→        list_key = parts[-1]
  1878→        current_list = current.get(list_key, [])
  1879→        if not isinstance(current_list, list):
  1880→            current_list = []
  1881→
  1882→        # 追加并限制长度（新条目在前）
  1883→        current_list = [entry] + current_list[:max_items - 1]
  1884→        current[list_key] = current_list
  1885→
  1886→        # 写回
  1887→        if len(parts) > 1:
  1888→            # 多级路径：更新父级对象
  1889→            await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_state(
  1890→                user_id, skill_id, parts[0], skill_data.get(parts[0], {})
  1891→            )
  1892→        else:
  1893→            # 单级路径：直接更新
  1894→            await UnifiedProfileRepository.update_skill_state(
  1895→                user_id, skill_id, list_key, current_list
  1896→            )
  1897→
  1898→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1899→    # 缓存管理
  1900→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1901→
  1902→    @staticmethod
  1903→    async def _invalidate_cache(user_id: UUID, skill: str = None) -> None:
  1904→        """
  1905→        失效缓存
  1906→
  1907→        Args:
  1908→            user_id: 用户 ID
  1909→            skill: 如果指定，只失效该 skill 的缓存；否则失效所有缓存
  1910→        """
  1911→        try:
  1912→            from stores.profile_cache import get_profile_cache
  1913→            cache = get_profile_cache()
  1914→
  1915→            if skill:
  1916→                # 只失效特定 skill 的缓存
  1917→                await cache.invalidate_by_key(f"{user_id}:{skill}")
  1918→                # 也失效 all 缓存
  1919→                await cache.invalidate_by_key(f"{user_id}:all")
  1920→            else:
  1921→                # 失效该用户所有缓存
  1922→                await cache.invalidate_by_prefix(str(user_id))
  1923→
  1924→            logger.debug(f"缓存已失效: user_id={user_id}, skill={skill}")
  1925→        except Exception as e:
  1926→            logger.warning(f"缓存失效失败: {e}")
  1927→
  1928→
  1929→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1930→# 便捷函数 (兼容旧代码)
  1931→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  1932→
  1933→async def get_unified_profile(user_id: UUID) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
  1934→    """获取统一 Profile (便捷函数)"""
  1935→    return await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1936→
  1937→
  1938→async def get_unified_profile_with_skill(user_id: UUID, skill: str = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
  1939→    """
  1940→    获取 Profile 和 Skill 数据 (兼容 profile_cache 接口)
  1941→
  1942→    Returns:
  1943→        {
  1944→            "profile": {...},
  1945→            "skill_data": {...}
  1946→        }
  1947→    """
  1948→    profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
  1949→
  1950→    if profile:
  1951→        skill_data = profile.get("skill_data", {})
  1952→        return {
  1953→            "profile": profile,
  1954→            "skill_data": skill_data
  1955→        }
  1956→
  1957→    return {"profile": {}, "skill_data": {}}
  1958→

content.content:
1→# VibeProfile v13 设计文档
     2→
     3→> 配置驱动的用户画像架构：从交互中提取，注入 Context，个性化服务
     4→
     5→## 一、设计原则
     6→
     7→```
     8→Vibe = 关于用户的结构化记忆
     9→
    10→输入：用户在系统中的所有交互（对话、工具调用、Skill 数据）
    11→输出：结构化画像 → 注入 Context → 个性化服务
    12→```
    13→
    14→**核心原则**：
    15→1. **配置驱动**：提取规则全部在 YAML 配置，新增规则无需改代码
    16→2. **三层存储**：Hot（实时）+ Warm（定时）+ Cold（事件）
    17→3. **单一数据流**：统一提取管道，不再多路径写入
    18→
    19→## 二、整体架构
    20→
    21→```
    22→┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
    23→│                    VibeProfile 配置驱动架构 v13                              │
    24→├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
    25→│                                                                             │
    26→│   配置文件                                                                   │
    27→│   ────────                                                                  │
    28→│   config/vibe_extract.yaml                                                  │
    29→│   ├── sources: 数据源定义                                                   │
    30→│   ├── extractors: 提取器配置                                                │
    31→│   ├── schema: Vibe 结构定义                                                 │
    32→│   └── transforms: 转换函数                                                  │
    33→│                                                                             │
    34→│   ════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════ │
    35→│                                                                             │
    36→│   数据源                          提取引擎                    存储          │
    37→│   ──────                          ────────                    ────          │
    38→│                                                                             │
    39→│   ┌─────────────────┐                                                       │
    40→│   │    messages     │────┐        ┌──────────────────────┐                  │
    41→│   │  对话消息        │    │        │                      │                  │
    42→│   └─────────────────┘    │        │   VibeExtractor      │                  │
    43→│                          │        │   ──────────────     │                  │
    44→│   ┌─────────────────┐    │        │                      │   ┌───────────┐ │
    45→│   │   tool_calls    │────┼───────▶│  根据 YAML 配置：    │──▶│  vibe.*   │ │
    46→│   │  工具调用结果    │    │        │  - 匹配数据源        │   │           │ │
    47→│   └─────────────────┘    │        │  - 执行提取规则      │   │  current  │ │
    48→│                          │        │  - 应用转换函数      │   │  profile  │ │
    49→│   ┌─────────────────┐    │        │  - 写入目标路径      │   │  timeline │ │
    50→│   │    skills.*     │────┤        │                      │   └───────────┘ │
    51→│   │  Skill 计算数据  │    │        └──────────────────────┘                  │
    52→│   └─────────────────┘    │                                                  │
    53→│                          │                                                  │
    54→│   ┌─────────────────┐    │                                                  │
    55→│   │  usage_events   │────┘                                                  │
    56→│   │  用户行为事件    │                                                       │
    57→│   └─────────────────┘                                                       │
    58→│                                                                             │
    59→└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
    60→```
    61→
    62→## 三、配置文件设计
    63→
    64→### 3.1 完整配置文件 `config/vibe_extract.yaml`
    65→
    66→```yaml
    67→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    68→# Vibe 提取配置 v13
    69→#
    70→# 配置驱动的用户画像提取系统
    71→# 修改此配置无需改代码，重启服务即可生效
    72→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    73→
    74→version: "13.0"
    75→
    76→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    77→# 1. Vibe 结构定义（Schema）
    78→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    79→schema:
    80→  vibe:
    81→    current:           # Hot Layer - 当前状态
    82→      emotion: string  # anxious|sad|neutral|content|excited|focused
    83→      energy: string   # low|medium|high
    84→      focus: list      # 当前关注领域
    85→      topics: list     # 进行中的话题（max 5）
    86→      context: string  # 当前对话上下文摘要
    87→      updated_at: datetime
    88→
    89→    profile:           # Warm Layer - 稳定画像
    90→      identity:
    91→        archetypes: list   # 人格原型
    92→        traits: list       # 核心特质（max 5）
    93→        style: string      # 沟通风格
    94→        sources: object    # 来源追溯
    95→      goals: list          # 目标列表
    96→      people: list         # 关键人物
    97→      context:
    98→        occupation: string
    99→        industry: string
   100→        life_stage: string
   101→        concerns: list
   102→        interests: list
   103→      preferences:
   104→        response_style: string
   105→        language: string
   106→        topics_to_avoid: list
   107→      updated_at: datetime
   108→
   109→    timeline: list     # Cold Layer - 事件时间线
   110→
   111→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   112→# 2. 数据源定义
   113→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   114→sources:
   115→  messages:
   116→    description: "对话消息"
   117→    table: messages
   118→    fields: [role, content, created_at, metadata]
   119→
   120→  tool_calls:
   121→    description: "工具调用结果"
   122→    from: messages.metadata.tool_calls
   123→    fields: [tool_name, arguments, result]
   124→
   125→  skills:
   126→    description: "Skill 计算数据"
   127→    from: unified_profiles.profile.skills
   128→    fields: ["*"]  # 动态字段
   129→
   130→  usage_events:
   131→    description: "用户行为事件"
   132→    table: usage_events
   133→    fields: [event_type, event_data, created_at]
   134→
   135→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   136→# 3. 提取器配置
   137→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   138→extractors:
   139→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   140→  # 3.1 实时提取器（Hot Extractor）
   141→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   142→  realtime:
   143→    trigger: on_conversation_turn  # 每轮对话后
   144→    target: vibe.current
   145→    write_strategy: overwrite      # 覆盖写入
   146→
   147→    input:
   148→      source: messages
   149→      filter: "conversation_id = :current AND created_at > :last_10"
   150→      limit: 10
   151→
   152→    extraction:
   153→      method: llm
   154→      model: fast          # 使用快速模型
   155→      prompt: |
   156→        分析对话，提取用户当前状态。只返回 JSON。
   157→
   158→        {
   159→          "emotion": "focused",
   160→          "energy": "high",
   161→          "focus": ["career"],
   162→          "topics": ["..."],
   163→          "context": "一句话总结"
   164→        }
   165→
   166→      output_mapping:
   167→        emotion: current.emotion
   168→        energy: current.energy
   169→        focus: current.focus
   170→        topics: current.topics
   171→        context: current.context
   172→
   173→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   174→  # 3.2 定时提取器（Warm Extractor）
   175→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   176→  daily:
   177→    trigger: cron("0 4 * * *")  # 每日 04:00
   178→    target: vibe.profile
   179→    write_strategy: merge       # 增量合并
   180→
   181→    input:
   182→      sources:
   183→        - source: messages
   184→          filter: "created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'"
   185→          limit: 200
   186→        - source: skills
   187→          fields: [bazi.chart, zodiac.chart, lifecoach.goals]
   188→        - source: tool_calls
   189→          filter: "created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'"
   190→
   191→    extraction:
   192→      method: llm
   193→      model: standard
   194→      prompt: |
   195→        分析用户过去一周的交互记录，更新用户画像。
   196→
   197→        ## 当前画像
   198→        {current_profile}
   199→
   200→        ## 交互记录
   201→        {interactions}
   202→
   203→        ## Skill 数据
   204→        {skill_data}
   205→
   206→        只返回需要新增或更新的字段（JSON）。
   207→
   208→      output_mapping:
   209→        identity.archetypes: profile.identity.archetypes
   210→        identity.traits: profile.identity.traits
   211→        identity.style: profile.identity.style
   212→        goals: profile.goals
   213→        people: profile.people
   214→        context: profile.context
   215→        preferences: profile.preferences
   216→
   217→    merge_rules:
   218→      profile.identity.archetypes:
   219→        strategy: append_unique
   220→        max_items: 3
   221→      profile.identity.traits:
   222→        strategy: append_unique
   223→        max_items: 5
   224→      profile.goals:
   225→        strategy: merge_by_id
   226→        id_field: title
   227→        max_items: 10
   228→      profile.people:
   229→        strategy: merge_by_id
   230→        id_field: name
   231→        max_items: 20
   232→      profile.context.concerns:
   233→        strategy: append_unique
   234→        max_items: 5
   235→      profile.context.interests:
   236→        strategy: append_unique
   237→        max_items: 10
   238→
   239→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   240→  # 3.3 事件检测器（Cold Detector）
   241→  # ─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
   242→  event_detector:
   243→    trigger: on_conversation_turn  # 实时检测
   244→    target: vibe.timeline
   245→    write_strategy: append         # 追加存储
   246→    max_items: 100
   247→
   248→    detectors:
   249→      - name: goal_detector
   250→        description: "检测新目标设定"
   251→        patterns:
   252→          - "想要.*"
   253→          - "计划.*"
   254→          - "目标是.*"
   255→          - "打算.*"
   256→        extract:
   257→          type: "goal"
   258→          event: "设定新目标"
   259→          data:
   260→            title: "{extracted_goal}"
   261→
   262→      - name: person_detector
   263→        description: "检测关键人物提及"
   264→        patterns:
   265→          - "(我的)?(伴侣|老公|老婆|男朋友|女朋友|爸|妈|父亲|母亲).*叫?([\\u4e00-\\u9fa5]{2,4})"
   266→          - "(朋友|同事|老板).*([\\u4e00-\\u9fa5]{2,4})"
   267→        extract:
   268→          type: "relationship"
   269→          event: "提及关键人物"
   270→          data:
   271→            name: "{matched_name}"
   272→            relation: "{matched_relation}"
   273→
   274→      - name: decision_detector
   275→        description: "检测重要决策"
   276→        patterns:
   277→          - "(纠结|犹豫|考虑).*(要不要|是否|该不该)"
   278→          - "面临.*选择"
   279→          - "(offer|工作机会|跳槽)"
   280→        extract:
   281→          type: "decision"
   282→          event: "面临重要决策"
   283→          data:
   284→            title: "{extracted_decision}"
   285→
   286→      - name: life_event_detector

   294→        extract:

   303→  skill_sync:

   308→    rules:

   326→      - skill: lifecoach

   333→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   334→# 4. 转换函数定义
   335→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   336→transforms:
   337→  bazi_to_archetype:
   338→    description: "五行元素 → 人格原型"
   339→    mapping:

   352→      cancer: { archetype: "守护者", traits: ["敏感", "关怀"] }

   354→      virgo: { archetype: "完善者", traits: ["细致", "分析"] }
   355→      libra: { archetype: "和谐者", traits: ["和谐", "公正"] }
   356→      scorpio: { archetype: "洞察者", traits: ["深度", "洞察"] }
   357→      sagittarius: { archetype: "探索者", traits: ["乐观", "探索"] }

   362→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   363→# 5. 合并策略定义
   364→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   365→merge_strategies:

   369→  merge:

   372→  append_unique:

   377→  merge_by_id:

   387→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   388→# 6. Context 注入配置

   390→context_injection:
   391→  template: |
   392→    {% if current.emotion or current.focus %}

   400→    {% endif %}
   401→    {% if profile.identity.traits %}

   403→    {% endif %}

   405→    【当前目标】{% for g in active_goals[:3] %}{{ g.title }}({{ g.progress | default(0) }}%){% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}{% endfor %}
   406→    {% endif %}
   407→    {% if profile.context.occupation %}
   408→    【职业】{{ profile.context.occupation }}
   409→    {% endif %}
   410→    {% if profile.context.concerns %}
   411→    【关注问题】{{ profile.context.concerns[:3] | join(', ') }}
   412→    {% endif %}
   413→
   414→  # 按 Skill 定制注入内容
   415→  skill_overrides:
   416→    lifecoach:
   417→      include: [current, profile.goals, profile.context]
   418→      exclude: [profile.identity.sources]
   419→    bazi:

   421→    zodiac:
   422→      include: [profile.identity.sources.zodiac, current.focus]
   423→```
   424→
   425→## 四、Vibe 层完整结构
   426→
   427→```yaml

   444→  # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   445→  profile:

   501→      data: { goal_id: "g_001" }

   503→
   504→## 五、提取引擎设计
   505→
   506→```python
   507→# services/vibe/extractor.py
   508→
   509→class VibeExtractor:
   510→    """
   511→    配置驱动的 Vibe 提取引擎
   512→
   513→    根据 vibe_extract.yaml 配置执行提取
   514→    """
   515→
   516→    def __init__(self, config_path: str = "config/vibe_extract.yaml"):
   517→        self.config = self._load_config(config_path)
   518→        self.transforms = self._load_transforms()
   519→
   520→    async def extract_realtime(self, user_id: UUID, messages: List[Dict]) -> Dict:
   521→        """
   522→        实时提取（每轮对话后调用）
   523→
   524→        读取 extractors.realtime 配置执行
   525→        """
   526→        config = self.config["extractors"]["realtime"]
   527→
   528→        # 1. 准备输入
   529→        input_data = self._prepare_input(messages, config["input"])
   530→
   531→        # 2. 执行 LLM 提取
   532→        result = await self._llm_extract(input_data, config["extraction"])
   533→
   534→        # 3. 映射输出
   535→        vibe_current = self._map_output(result, config["extraction"]["output_mapping"])
   536→
   537→        # 4. 写入（覆盖）
   538→        await self._write_vibe(user_id, "current", vibe_current, "overwrite")
   539→
   540→        # 5. 执行事件检测
   541→        events = await self._detect_events(user_id, messages)
   542→        if events:
   543→            await self._append_timeline(user_id, events)
   544→
   545→        return vibe_current
   546→
   547→    async def extract_daily(self, user_id: UUID) -> Dict:
   548→        """
   549→        定时提取（每日凌晨调用）
   550→
   551→        读取 extractors.daily 配置执行
   552→        """
   553→        config = self.config["extractors"]["daily"]
   554→
   555→        # 1. 收集多数据源输入
   556→        input_data = await self._collect_inputs(user_id, config["input"]["sources"])
   557→
   558→        # 2. 获取当前 profile
   559→        current_profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_vibe_profile(user_id)
   560→
   561→        # 3. 执行 LLM 提取
   562→        result = await self._llm_extract(
   563→            {"interactions": input_data, "current_profile": current_profile},
   564→            config["extraction"]
   565→        )
   566→
   567→        # 4. 应用合并规则
   568→        merged = self._merge_with_rules(current_profile, result, config["merge_rules"])
   569→
   570→        # 5. 写入（合并）
   571→        await self._write_vibe(user_id, "profile", merged, "merge")
   572→
   573→        return merged
   574→
   575→    async def sync_skill_data(self, user_id: UUID, skill_id: str, skill_data: Dict) -> bool:
   576→        """
   577→        Skill 数据同步（Skill 数据更新时调用）
   578→
   579→        读取 extractors.skill_sync 配置执行
   580→        """
   581→        config = self.config["extractors"]["skill_sync"]
   582→        rules = [r for r in config["rules"] if r["skill"] == skill_id]
   583→
   584→        if not rules:
   585→            return False
   586→
   587→        for rule in rules:
   588→            # 检查触发条件
   589→            trigger_path = rule["when"]
   590→            if not self._get_nested(skill_data, trigger_path):
   591→                continue
   592→
   593→            # 提取字段
   594→            extracted = {}
   595→            for dest, source in rule["extract"].items():
   596→                value = self._get_nested(skill_data, source)
   597→                if value:
   598→                    extracted[dest] = value
   599→
   600→            # 应用转换
   601→            if "transform" in rule:
   602→                extracted = self._apply_transform(extracted, rule["transform"])
   603→
   604→            # 写入目标
   605→            await self._write_to_path(user_id, rule["target"], extracted)
   606→
   607→        return True
   608→
   609→    def build_context(self, vibe: Dict, skill_id: str = None) -> str:
   610→        """
   611→        构建 Context 注入字符串
   612→
   613→        读取 context_injection 配置，使用 Jinja2 模板
   614→        """
   615→        config = self.config["context_injection"]
   616→        template = config["template"]
   617→
   618→        # 检查 Skill 定制
   619→        if skill_id and skill_id in config.get("skill_overrides", {}):
   620→            override = config["skill_overrides"][skill_id]
   621→            # 过滤数据
   622→            vibe = self._filter_vibe(vibe, override.get("include"), override.get("exclude"))
   623→
   624→        # 渲染模板
   625→        return self._render_template(template, vibe)
   626→```
   627→
   628→## 六、数据流设计
   629→
   630→```
   631→┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
   632→│                         配置驱动数据流                                       │
   633→├─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┤
   634→│                                                                             │
   635→│   触发事件                      提取引擎                      存储          │
   636→│   ────────                      ────────                      ────          │
   637→│                                                                             │
   638→│   ┌─────────────────┐                                                       │
   639→│   │  对话结束        │     ┌──────────────────────────────┐                 │
   640→│   │  on_turn_end    │────▶│  VibeExtractor               │                 │
   641→│   └─────────────────┘     │                              │                 │
   642→│                           │  1. 读取 vibe_extract.yaml   │  ┌───────────┐ │
   643→│   ┌─────────────────┐     │  2. 匹配 extractors.realtime │  │           │ │
   644→│   │  定时任务        │────▶│  3. 准备输入数据             │──▶│  vibe.*   │ │
   645→│   │  cron 04:00     │     │  4. 执行 LLM 提取            │  │           │ │
   646→│   └─────────────────┘     │  5. 应用 output_mapping      │  │  current  │ │
   647→│                           │  6. 应用 merge_rules         │  │  profile  │ │
   648→│   ┌─────────────────┐     │  7. 写入目标路径             │  │  timeline │ │
   649→│   │  Skill 数据更新  │────▶│                              │  │           │ │
   650→│   │  on_skill_update│     │  配置即规则，无硬编码        │  └───────────┘ │
   651→│   └─────────────────┘     └──────────────────────────────┘                 │
   652→│                                                                             │
   653→└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
   654→```
   655→
   656→## 七、API 设计
   657→
   658→```python
   659→class UnifiedProfileRepository:
   660→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   661→    # Vibe 读取
   662→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   663→
   664→    async def get_vibe(user_id: UUID) -> Dict:
   665→        """获取完整 Vibe 数据"""
   666→
   667→    async def get_vibe_current(user_id: UUID) -> Dict:
   668→        """获取当前状态（Hot Layer）"""
   669→
   670→    async def get_vibe_profile(user_id: UUID) -> Dict:
   671→        """获取稳定画像（Warm Layer）"""
   672→
   673→    async def get_vibe_timeline(user_id: UUID, limit: int = 20) -> List[Dict]:
   674→        """获取事件时间线（Cold Layer）"""
   675→
   676→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   677→    # Vibe 写入（供 VibeExtractor 调用）
   678→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   679→
   680→    async def update_vibe_current(user_id: UUID, current: Dict) -> None:
   681→        """更新当前状态（覆盖写入）"""
   682→
   683→    async def update_vibe_profile(user_id: UUID, updates: Dict, merge_rules: Dict = None) -> None:
   684→        """更新稳定画像（按规则合并）"""
   685→
   686→    async def append_vibe_timeline(user_id: UUID, event: Dict) -> str:
   687→        """追加事件到时间线"""
   688→
   689→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   690→    # Context 注入
   691→    # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   692→
   693→    async def get_vibe_context(user_id: UUID, skill_id: str = None) -> str:
   694→        """
   695→        获取用于注入 System Prompt 的上下文字符串
   696→
   697→        读取 vibe_extract.yaml 的 context_injection 配置
   698→        """
   699→```
   700→
   701→## 八、配置扩展示例
   702→
   703→### 8.1 添加新的提取规则
   704→
   705→```yaml
   706→# 在 extractors 下添加新规则
   707→extractors:
   708→  # 新增：周报提取器
   709→  weekly_summary:
   710→    trigger: cron("0 20 * * 0")  # 每周日 20:00
   711→    target: vibe.profile.weekly_summary
   712→    write_strategy: overwrite
   713→
   714→    input:
   715→      source: messages
   716→      filter: "created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'"
   717→
   718→    extraction:
   719→      method: llm
   720→      prompt: |
   721→        总结用户本周的对话主题和情绪变化...
   722→```
   723→
   724→### 8.2 添加新的事件检测器
   725→
   726→```yaml
   727→# 在 event_detector.detectors 下添加
   728→detectors:
   729→  - name: mood_shift_detector
   730→    description: "检测情绪剧烈变化"
   731→    method: sentiment_analysis
   732→    threshold: 0.5  # 情绪变化阈值
   733→    extract:
   734→      type: "mood_shift"
   735→      event: "情绪变化"
   736→      data:

   738→        to: "{current_mood}"

   740→
   741→### 8.3 添加新的转换函数
   742→
   743→```yaml
   744→# 在 transforms 下添加
   745→transforms:
   746→  mbti_to_traits:
   747→    description: "MBTI → 特质"
   748→    mapping:
   749→      INTJ: { archetype: "策略师", traits: ["独立", "分析"] }
   750→      ENFP: { archetype: "探索者", traits: ["热情", "创意"] }
   751→      # ...
   752→```
   753→
   754→## 九、与 v12 的迁移映射
   755→
   756→| v12 结构 | v13 结构 | 配置位置 |
   757→|----------|----------|----------|
   758→| insight.essence.archetype | profile.identity.archetypes | transforms.bazi_to_archetype |
   759→| insight.essence.traits | profile.identity.traits | extractors.daily.merge_rules |

   765→
   766→| 版本 | 日期 | 变更 |

data.prompt:
我需要理解 VibeLife 项目中 VibeProfile 提取系统的当前实现状态。

根据文档 docs/components/VibeProfile.md，设计了一个配置驱动的 vibe_extract.yaml 系统。请帮我探索：

1. **配置文件**：
   - 是否存在 `config/vibe_extract.yaml` 文件？
   - 查找 config 目录下所有 yaml 配置文件

2. **VibeExtractor 实现**：
   - 是否有 `services/vibe/extractor.py` 或类似文件？
   - 当前的 Vibe 提取是如何实现的？

3. **UnifiedProfileRepository**：

content.content:
1→"""
     2→Unified Tool Registry v6 - 统一工具注册表
     3→
     4→解决工具注册的硬编码问题：
     5→1. 从 YAML 加载工具定义 (Single Source of Truth)
     6→2. 使用 @tool_handler 装饰器动态注册执行器
     7→3. 消除 if-elif 分发，使用注册表查找
     8→
     9→V6.1 更新：
    10→- 全局工具从 skills/core/tools/ 加载
    11→- 移除对 GLOBAL_TOOLS 硬编码的依赖
    12→
    13→新增工具只需修改 2 处：
    14→1. skills/{skill_id}/tools/tools.yaml - 工具定义
    15→2. skills/{skill_id}/tools/handlers.py - @tool_handler 执行器
    16→
    17→用法：
    18→    from services.agent.tool_registry import tool_handler, ToolRegistry
    19→
    20→    @tool_handler("show_bazi_chart")
    21→    async def execute_show_bazi_chart(args: Dict, context: ToolContext) -> Dict:
    22→        return {"chart": ...}
    23→
    24→    # CoreAgent 中使用
    25→    tools = ToolRegistry.get_tools_for_skill("bazi")
    26→    result = await ToolRegistry.execute("show_bazi_chart", args, context)
    27→"""
    28→import logging
    29→import importlib
    30→import asyncio
    31→from pathlib import Path
    32→from typing import Dict, Any, List, Optional, Callable, Awaitable, Union
    33→from dataclasses import dataclass, field
    34→from functools import wraps
    35→
    36→from .tool_schema import ToolDef, load_skill_tools, get_global_tools
    37→
    38→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    39→
    40→SKILLS_DIR = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent / "skills"
    41→
    42→
    43→@dataclass
    44→class ToolContext:
    45→    """工具执行上下文"""
    46→    user_id: str
    47→    user_tier: str = "free"
    48→    profile: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    49→    skill_data: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
    50→    skill_id: Optional[str] = None
    51→    scenario_id: Optional[str] = None
    52→    conversation_id: Optional[str] = None
    53→
    54→
    55→# 工具执行器类型: 同步或异步函数
    56→ToolHandler = Callable[[Dict[str, Any], ToolContext], Union[Dict[str, Any], Awaitable[Dict[str, Any]]]]
    57→
    58→
    59→class UnifiedToolRegistry:
    60→    """
    61→    统一工具注册表
    62→
    63→    - 工具定义从 YAML 加载
    64→    - 执行器通过 @tool_handler 装饰器注册
    65→    - 支持全局工具和 Skill 专属工具
    66→    """
    67→
    68→    # 工具定义缓存: {tool_name: ToolDef}
    69→    _tool_defs: Dict[str, ToolDef] = {}
    70→
    71→    # 工具执行器: {tool_name: handler_function}
    72→    _handlers: Dict[str, ToolHandler] = {}
    73→
    74→    # 已加载的 Skill
    75→    _loaded_skills: set = set()
    76→
    77→    # 是否已初始化
    78→    _initialized: bool = False
    79→
    80→    @classmethod
    81→    def initialize(cls):
    82→        """初始化注册表，加载全局工具"""
    83→        if cls._initialized:
    84→            return
    85→
    86→        # 从 core skill 加载全局工具定义
    87→        global_tools = get_global_tools()
    88→        for tool in global_tools:
    89→            tool.is_global = True
    90→            cls._tool_defs[tool.name] = tool
    91→
    92→        # 加载 core skill 的 handlers
    93→        cls._load_handlers_module("core")
    94→
    95→        # 自动发现并加载所有 Skill 的工具
    96→        cls._auto_discover_skills()
    97→
    98→        cls._initialized = True
    99→        logger.info(f"ToolRegistry initialized: {len(cls._tool_defs)} tools, {len(cls._handlers)} handlers")
   100→
   101→    @classmethod
   102→    def _auto_discover_skills(cls):
   103→        """自动发现并加载所有 Skill"""
   104→        if not SKILLS_DIR.exists():
   105→            logger.warning(f"Skills directory not found: {SKILLS_DIR}")
   106→            return
   107→
   108→        for skill_dir in SKILLS_DIR.iterdir():
   109→            if skill_dir.is_dir() and skill_dir.name != "__pycache__":
   110→                skill_id = skill_dir.name
   111→                cls.load_skill(skill_id)
   112→
   113→    @classmethod
   114→    def load_skill(cls, skill_id: str):
   115→        """加载 Skill 的工具定义和执行器"""
   116→        if skill_id in cls._loaded_skills:
   117→            return
   118→
   119→        # 1. 从 YAML 加载工具定义
   120→        tools = load_skill_tools(skill_id)
   121→        for tool in tools:
   122→            tool.skill_id = skill_id  # 标记所属 Skill
   123→            cls._tool_defs[tool.name] = tool
   124→
   125→        # 2. 尝试加载执行器模块
   126→        cls._load_handlers_module(skill_id)
   127→
   128→        cls._loaded_skills.add(skill_id)
   129→        logger.debug(f"Loaded skill '{skill_id}': {len(tools)} tools")
   130→
   131→    @classmethod
   132→    def _load_handlers_module(cls, skill_id: str):
   133→        """加载 Skill 的 handlers 模块"""
   134→        handlers_path = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "tools" / "handlers.py"
   135→        if not handlers_path.exists():
   136→            logger.debug(f"No handlers module for skill '{skill_id}'")
   137→            return
   138→
   139→        try:
   140→            module_name = f"skills.{skill_id}.tools.handlers"
   141→            importlib.import_module(module_name)
   142→            logger.debug(f"Loaded handlers module: {module_name}")
   143→        except ImportError as e:
   144→            logger.warning(f"Failed to import handlers for '{skill_id}': {e}")
   145→
   146→    @classmethod
   147→    def register_handler(cls, tool_name: str, handler: ToolHandler):
   148→        """注册工具执行器"""
   149→        cls._handlers[tool_name] = handler
   150→        logger.debug(f"Registered handler: {tool_name}")
   151→
   152→    @classmethod
   153→    def get_tool_def(cls, tool_name: str) -> Optional[ToolDef]:
   154→        """获取工具定义"""
   155→        cls.initialize()
   156→        return cls._tool_defs.get(tool_name)
   157→
   158→    @classmethod
   159→    def get_tools_for_skill(cls, skill_id: str) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   160→        """获取 Skill 的所有工具 (OpenAI 格式)
   161→
   162→        V6.2 更新：按需加载全局工具
   163→        - 如果 SKILL.md 中声明了 global_tools，只加载声明的全局工具
   164→        - 如果没有声明，加载所有全局工具（向后兼容）
   165→        """
   166→        cls.initialize()
   167→
   168→        tools = []
   169→
   170→        # 获取 Skill 声明需要的全局工具
   171→        from .skill_loader import get_skill_global_tools
   172→        declared_global_tools = get_skill_global_tools(skill_id)
   173→
   174→        # 全局工具（从 core skill 加载）
   175→        all_global_tools = get_global_tools()
   176→        for tool in all_global_tools:
   177→            # 如果声明了 global_tools，只加载声明的；否则加载全部
   178→            if declared_global_tools:
   179→                if tool.name in declared_global_tools:
   180→                    tools.append(tool.to_openai_format())
   181→            else:
   182→                # 向后兼容：没有声明则加载全部
   183→                tools.append(tool.to_openai_format())
   184→
   185→        # Skill 专属工具（跳过 core，因为已经加载了）
   186→        if skill_id != "core":
   187→            for name, tool in cls._tool_defs.items():
   188→                if getattr(tool, 'skill_id', None) == skill_id:
   189→                    tools.append(tool.to_openai_format())
   190→
   191→        # v7.3: 外部工具（从其他 skill 导入）
   192→        from .skill_loader import get_skill_external_tools
   193→        external_tool_names = get_skill_external_tools(skill_id)
   194→        if external_tool_names:
   195→            for name, tool in cls._tool_defs.items():
   196→                if name in external_tool_names:
   197→                    tools.append(tool.to_openai_format())
   198→
   199→        return tools
   200→
   201→    @classmethod
   202→    def get_all_tools(cls) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   203→        """获取所有已注册的工具 (OpenAI 格式)"""
   204→        cls.initialize()
   205→        return [tool.to_openai_format() for tool in cls._tool_defs.values()]
   206→
   207→    @classmethod
   208→    def get_card_type(cls, tool_name: str) -> Optional[str]:
   209→        """获取工具对应的卡片类型"""
   210→        tool = cls.get_tool_def(tool_name)
   211→        return tool.card_type if tool else None
   212→
   213→    @classmethod
   214→    def has_handler(cls, tool_name: str) -> bool:
   215→        """检查是否有注册的执行器"""
   216→        cls.initialize()
   217→        return tool_name in cls._handlers
   218→
   219→    @classmethod
   220→    async def execute(
   221→        cls,
   222→        tool_name: str,
   223→        args: Dict[str, Any],
   224→        context: ToolContext
   225→    ) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   226→        """执行工具"""
   227→        cls.initialize()
   228→
   229→        if tool_name not in cls._handlers:
   230→            logger.warning(f"No handler for tool: {tool_name}")
   231→            return {"error": f"Tool handler not found: {tool_name}"}
   232→
   233→        handler = cls._handlers[tool_name]
   234→
   235→        try:
   236→            # 支持同步和异步处理器
   237→            result = handler(args, context)
   238→            if asyncio.iscoroutine(result):
   239→                result = await result
   240→            return result
   241→        except Exception as e:
   242→            logger.error(f"Tool execution failed: {tool_name}, error: {e}")
   243→            return {"error": str(e)}
   244→
   245→    @classmethod
   246→    def get_schema(cls, skill_id: Optional[str] = None) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   247→        """获取工具 Schema (用于前端)"""
   248→        cls.initialize()
   249→
   250→        global_tool_names = {t.name for t in get_global_tools()}
   251→
   252→        # v7.3: 获取外部工具名
   253→        external_tool_names = set()
   254→        if skill_id:
   255→            from .skill_loader import get_skill_external_tools
   256→            external_tool_names = set(get_skill_external_tools(skill_id))
   257→
   258→        tools = []
   259→        for name, tool in cls._tool_defs.items():
   260→            if skill_id and getattr(tool, 'skill_id', None) != skill_id:
   261→                if name not in global_tool_names and name not in external_tool_names:
   262→                    continue
   263→
   264→            tools.append({
   265→                "name": tool.name,
   266→                "description": tool.description,
   267→                "tool_type": tool.tool_type,
   268→                "card_type": tool.card_type,
   269→                "fallback_type": tool.fallback_type,  # V7.1: 降级类型
   270→                "card_props": tool.card_props,  # 新增: 表单配置等
   271→                "parameters": [
   272→                    {
   273→                        "name": p.name,
   274→                        "type": p.type,
   275→                        "required": p.required,
   276→                        "description": p.description,
   277→                        "enum": p.enum,
   278→                        "default": p.default,
   279→                    }
   280→                    for p in tool.parameters
   281→                ],
   282→                "when_to_call": tool.when_to_call,
   283→            })
   284→
   285→        return {
   286→            "version": "7.1",
   287→            "skill_id": skill_id,
   288→            "tools": tools,
   289→        }
   290→
   291→    @classmethod
   292→    def clear(cls):
   293→        """清除所有注册 (用于测试)"""
   294→        cls._tool_defs.clear()
   295→        cls._handlers.clear()
   296→        cls._loaded_skills.clear()
   297→        cls._initialized = False
   298→
   299→
   300→def tool_handler(tool_name: str):
   301→    """
   302→    工具执行器装饰器
   303→
   304→    用法:
   305→        @tool_handler("show_bazi_chart")
   306→        async def execute_show_bazi_chart(args: Dict, context: ToolContext) -> Dict:
   307→            return {"chart": ...}
   308→    """
   309→    def decorator(func: ToolHandler) -> ToolHandler:
   310→        @wraps(func)
   311→        async def wrapper(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ToolContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   312→            result = func(args, context)
   313→            if asyncio.iscoroutine(result):
   314→                return await result
   315→            return result
   316→
   317→        # 注册到 Registry
   318→        UnifiedToolRegistry.register_handler(tool_name, wrapper)
   319→        return wrapper
   320→
   321→    return decorator
   322→
   323→
   324→# 便捷别名
   325→ToolRegistry = UnifiedToolRegistry
   326→

content.content:
1→"""
     2→CoreAgent v10 - Context Engineering 驱动
     3→
     4→v10 架构特性：
     5→- Context Engineering: 文件/JSONB 持久化状态，断点续传
     6→- 模块化: ContextManager, SessionManager, PromptBuilder, ToolExecutor
     7→- 会话恢复: 自动检测未完成会话，支持断点续传
     8→- 跨 Skill 共享: profile.extracted + identity
     9→
    10→v9 架构特性（保留）：
    11→- Phase 1 提供所有路由工具，LLM 一次性决策
    12→- 移除 Python 硬编码决策逻辑
    13→- 工具即行为：activate_skill, show_protocol_invitation, show_skill_intro
    14→
    15→v8 架构特性（保留）：
    16→- 分阶段上下文加载：Phase 1 (Skill 选择) / Phase 2 (Skill 执行)
    17→- use_skill 同轮重载：激活 skill 后同一轮内重新构建上下文
    18→"""
    19→import json
    20→import logging
    21→import time
    22→from typing import Optional, List, Dict, Any, AsyncGenerator
    23→from dataclasses import dataclass
    24→from enum import Enum

    82→def build_phase1_tools() -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
    83→    """
    84→    构建 Phase 1 路由工具集 - v10: 配置驱动
    85→
    86→    工具列表：
    87→    1. activate_skill - 激活 skill 并切换上下文
    88→    2. show_protocol_invitation - 展示协议邀请卡片
    89→    3. show_skill_intro - 展示 skill 介绍卡片
    90→    4. recommend_skills - 推荐相关 skills
    91→    """
    92→    from .skill_loader import get_available_skills
    93→
    94→    available_skills = [s for s in get_available_skills() if s != "core"]
    95→    protocols = get_all_protocols()
    96→    protocol_ids = list(protocols.keys()) if protocols else ["dankoe", "covey", "yangming", "liaofan"]
    97→
    98→    # 工具 1: activate_skill
    99→    activate_skill_tool = {
   100→        "type": "function",
   101→        "function": {
   102→            "name": "activate_skill",
   103→            "description": build_skill_tool_description(),
   104→            "parameters": {
   105→                "type": "object",
   106→                "properties": {
   107→                    "skill": {
   108→                        "type": "string",
   109→                        "enum": available_skills,
   110→                        "description": "要激活的技能 ID"
   111→                    },
   112→                    "rule": {
   113→                        "type": "string",
   114→                        "description": "可选的规则 ID，用于指定具体场景"
   115→                    }
   116→                },
   117→                "required": ["skill"]
   118→            }
   119→        }
   120→    }
   121→
   122→    # 工具 2: show_protocol_invitation
   123→    show_protocol_invitation_tool = {
   124→        "type": "function",
   125→        "function": {
   126→            "name": "show_protocol_invitation",
   127→            "description": build_protocol_tool_description(),
   128→            "parameters": {
   129→                "type": "object",
   130→                "properties": {
   131→                    "protocol_id": {
   132→                        "type": "string",
   133→                        "enum": protocol_ids,
   134→                        "description": "协议 ID"
   135→                    }
   136→                },
   137→                "required": ["protocol_id"]
   138→            }
   139→        }
   140→    }
   141→
   142→    # 工具 3: show_skill_intro
   143→    show_skill_intro_tool = {
   144→        "type": "function",
   145→        "function": {
   146→            "name": "show_skill_intro",
   147→            "description": """展示 Skill 介绍卡片。
   148→
   149→## 何时调用
   150→- 用户问"这个能做什么"、"有什么功能"
   151→- 用户首次使用某个 Skill""",
   152→            "parameters": {
   153→                "type": "object",
   154→                "properties": {
   155→                    "skill": {
   156→                        "type": "string",
   157→                        "enum": available_skills,
   158→                        "description": "要介绍的技能 ID"
   159→                    }
   160→                },
   161→                "required": ["skill"]
   162→            }
   163→        }
   164→    }
   165→
   166→    # 工具 4: recommend_skills
   167→    recommend_skills_tool = {
   168→        "type": "function",
   169→        "function": {
   170→            "name": "recommend_skills",
   171→            "description": "推荐 Skills 给用户选择。\n\n## 何时调用\n- 用户打招呼（你好）→ 展示能力\n- 不确定用户想用哪个 skill\n- 用户说「帮帮我」、「有什么推荐」",
   172→            "parameters": {
   173→                "type": "object",
   174→                "properties": {
   175→                    "skills": {
   176→                        "type": "array",
   177→                        "items": {"type": "string", "enum": available_skills},
   178→                        "description": "推荐的技能列表（2-3个）"
   179→                    },
   180→                    "reason": {
   181→                        "type": "string",
   182→                        "description": "简短的推荐理由或欢迎语"
   183→                    }
   184→                },
   185→                "required": ["skills", "reason"]
   186→            }
   187→        }
   188→    }
   189→
   190→    return [
   191→        activate_skill_tool,
   192→        show_protocol_invitation_tool,
   193→        show_skill_intro_tool,
   194→        recommend_skills_tool
   195→    ]
   196→
   197→
   198→# 缓存动态生成的工具定义
   199→_PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE: Optional[List[Dict[str, Any]]] = None
   200→
   201→
   202→def get_phase1_tools() -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   203→    """获取 Phase 1 工具定义（带缓存）"""
   204→    global _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE
   205→    if _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE is None:
   206→        _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE = build_phase1_tools()
   207→    return _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE
