   132→                        "type": "string",
   133→                        "enum": protocol_ids,
   134→                        "description": "协议 ID"
   135→                    }
   136→                },
   137→                "required": ["protocol_id"]
   138→            }
   139→        }
   140→    }
   141→
   142→    # 工具 3: show_skill_intro
   143→    show_skill_intro_tool = {
   144→        "type": "function",
   145→        "function": {
   146→            "name": "show_skill_intro",
   147→            "description": """展示 Skill 介绍卡片。
   148→
   149→## 何时调用
   150→- 用户问"这个能做什么"、"有什么功能"
   151→- 用户首次使用某个 Skill""",
   152→            "parameters": {
   153→                "type": "object",
   154→                "properties": {
   155→                    "skill": {
   156→                        "type": "string",
   157→                        "enum": available_skills,
   158→                        "description": "要介绍的技能 ID"
   159→                    }
   160→                },
   161→                "required": ["skill"]
   162→            }
   163→        }
   164→    }
   165→
   166→    # 工具 4: recommend_skills
   167→    recommend_skills_tool = {
   168→        "type": "function",
   169→        "function": {
   170→            "name": "recommend_skills",
   171→            "description": "推荐 Skills 给用户选择。\n\n## 何时调用\n- 用户打招呼（你好）→ 展示能力\n- 不确定用户想用哪个 skill\n- 用户说「帮帮我」、「有什么推荐」",
   172→            "parameters": {
   173→                "type": "object",
   174→                "properties": {
   175→                    "skills": {
   176→                        "type": "array",
   177→                        "items": {"type": "string", "enum": available_skills},
   178→                        "description": "推荐的技能列表（2-3个）"
   179→                    },
   180→                    "reason": {
   181→                        "type": "string",
   182→                        "description": "简短的推荐理由或欢迎语"
   183→                    }
   184→                },
   185→                "required": ["skills", "reason"]
   186→            }
   187→        }
   188→    }
   189→
   190→    return [
   191→        activate_skill_tool,
   192→        show_protocol_invitation_tool,
   193→        show_skill_intro_tool,
   194→        recommend_skills_tool
   195→    ]
   196→
   197→
   198→# 缓存动态生成的工具定义
   199→_PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE: Optional[List[Dict[str, Any]]] = None
   200→
   201→
   202→def get_phase1_tools() -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   203→    """获取 Phase 1 工具定义（带缓存）"""
   204→    global _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE
   205→    if _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE is None:
   206→        _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE = build_phase1_tools()
   207→    return _PHASE1_TOOLS_CACHE
   208→
   209→
   210→class CoreAgent:
   211→    """
   212→    CoreAgent v10 - Context Engineering 驱动
   213→
   214→    Features:
   215→    - 会话恢复检查：自动检测未完成会话
   216→    - 断点续传：从 checkpoint 恢复执行
   217→    - 模块化设计：ContextManager, SessionManager, PromptBuilder, ToolExecutor
   218→    - 分阶段上下文加载
   219→    """
   220→
   221→    def __init__(
   222→        self,
   223→        llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
   224→        max_iterations: int = 10,
   225→        case_index: Optional[CaseIndex] = None
   226→    ):
   227→        self.llm = llm or get_llm_client()
   228→        self.max_iterations = max_iterations
   229→        self.case_index = case_index or get_case_index()
   230→        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
   231→
   232→        # v10: 新增模块
   233→        self.context_manager: ContextManager = get_context_manager()
   234→        self.session_manager: SessionManager = get_session_manager()
   235→        self.prompt_builder: PromptBuilder = get_prompt_builder()
   236→        self.tool_executor: ToolExecutor = get_tool_executor()
   237→
   238→        # 运行时状态
   239→        self._active_skill: Optional[str] = None
   240→        self._active_scenario: Optional[str] = None
   241→        self._current_message: str = ""
   242→        self._context: Optional[AgentContext] = None
   243→        self._messages: Optional[List[LLMMessage]] = None
   244→        self._session_context: Optional[SessionContext] = None
   245→        self._perf_log: Dict[str, Any] = {}
   246→
   247→    @property
   248→    def usage(self) -> Dict[str, int]:
   249→        """获取 LLM 使用统计"""
   250→        return self.llm.usage
   251→
   252→    async def run(
   253→        self,
   254→        message: str,
   255→        context: AgentContext
   256→    ) -> AsyncGenerator[AgentEvent, None]:
   257→        """执行 Agent 循环 - v10: Context Engineering 增强"""
   258→        self.state = AgentState.IDLE
   259→        self._current_message = message
   260→        self._context = context
   261→        self._perf_log = {
   262→            "iterations": 0,
   263→            "llm_calls": [],
   264→            "phase": "phase1" if not context.skill else "phase2"
   265→        }
   266→
   267→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   268→        # v10 Phase 0: 会话恢复检查
   269→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   270→        active_session = await self.session_manager.get_active_session(context.user_id)
   271→
   272→        if active_session and active_session.is_active:
   273→            # 检查是否应该恢复
   274→            if self.session_manager.should_resume(message, active_session):
   275→                # 恢复会话
   276→                yield AgentEvent(type="session_resume", data={
   277→                    "skill": active_session.skill_id,
   278→                    "rule": active_session.rule_id,
   279→                    "step": active_session.checkpoint_step,
   280→                    "total": active_session.checkpoint_total
   281→                })
   282→
   283→                # 自动激活 skill
   284→                self._active_skill = active_session.skill_id
   285→                self._active_scenario = active_session.rule_id
   286→
   287→                # 加载会话上下文
   288→                self._session_context = await self.context_manager.load_session_context(
   289→                    context.user_id,
   290→                    active_session.skill_id,
   291→                    active_session.rule_id
   292→                )
   293→                context.session_context = self._session_context
   294→
   295→                # 动态加载 profile
   296→                await self._reload_profile_for_skill(active_session.skill_id)
   297→
   298→                logger.info(f"[CoreAgent] Session resumed: skill={active_session.skill_id}, step={active_session.checkpoint_step}")
   299→
   300→            elif self.session_manager.should_ask_resume(message, active_session):
   301→                # 提示用户是否继续
   302→                resume_prompt = self.session_manager.build_resume_prompt(active_session)
   303→                yield AgentEvent(type="session_prompt", data={
   304→                    "prompt": resume_prompt,
   305→                    "session": active_session.to_dict()
   306→                })
   307→
   308→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   309→        # Phase 1/2: 正常执行流程
   310→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   311→
   312→        # 使用前端指定的 skill/scenario，或从会话恢复
   313→        if context.skill:
   314→            self._active_skill = context.skill
   315→            self._active_scenario = context.scenario
   316→        elif not self._active_skill:
   317→            self._active_skill = None
   318→            self._active_scenario = None
   319→
   320→        # 如果有 active skill 且没有加载 session context，现在加载
   321→        if self._active_skill and not self._session_context:
   322→            self._session_context = await self.context_manager.load_session_context(
   323→                context.user_id,
   324→                self._active_skill,
   325→                self._active_scenario
   326→            )
   327→            context.session_context = self._session_context
   328→
   329→        # 发送 SOP 阶段事件
   330→        if self._active_skill:
   331→            sop_status = self._compute_sop_status(context)
   332→            yield AgentEvent(type="sop_phase", data={
   333→                "skill": self._active_skill,
   334→                "scenario": self._active_scenario,
   335→                "status": sop_status,
   336→                "has_checkpoint": self._session_context.has_checkpoint if self._session_context else False,
   337→                "message": "LLM 驱动模式"
   338→            })
   339→
   340→        # 构建初始消息
   341→        t_prompt_start = time.time()
   342→        messages = await self._build_initial_messages(message, context)
   343→        self._messages = messages
   344→        self._perf_log["prompt_build_ms"] = int((time.time() - t_prompt_start) * 1000)
   345→        self._perf_log["system_prompt_len"] = len(messages[0].content) if messages else 0
   346→        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Prompt built: {self._perf_log['prompt_build_ms']}ms, len={self._perf_log['system_prompt_len']}")
   347→
   348→        # 主循环
   349→        for iteration in range(self.max_iterations):
   350→            self.state = AgentState.THINKING
   351→            yield AgentEvent(type="thinking", data={"iteration": iteration})
   352→            self._perf_log["iterations"] = iteration + 1
   353→
   354→            tools = self._get_current_tools(context)
   355→
   356→            try:
   357→                content_buffer = ""
   358→                tool_calls = []
   359→
   360→                t_llm_start = time.time()
   361→                first_token_time = None
   362→
   363→                async for chunk in self.llm.stream(
   364→                    messages=messages,
   365→                    tools=tools,
   366→                    tool_choice=None,
   367→                    user_tier=context.user_tier
   368→                ):
   369→                    if first_token_time is None:
   370→                        first_token_time = time.time()
   371→                        ttft = int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000)
   372→                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] LLM #{iteration+1} TTFT: {ttft}ms")
   373→
   374→                    if chunk["type"] == "content":
   375→                        content_buffer += chunk["content"]
   376→                        yield AgentEvent(type="content", data={"content": chunk["content"]})
   377→                    elif chunk["type"] == "tool_call":
   378→                        tool_calls.append(chunk)
   379→
   380→                llm_total = int((time.time() - t_llm_start) * 1000)
   381→                self._perf_log["llm_calls"].append({
   382→                    "iteration": iteration + 1,
   383→                    "ttft_ms": int((first_token_time - t_llm_start) * 1000) if first_token_time else 0,
   384→                    "total_ms": llm_total,
   385→                    "has_tools": len(tool_calls) > 0
   386→                })
   387→
   388→                if tool_calls:
   389→                    self.state = AgentState.TOOL_CALLING
   390→
   391→                    assistant_tool_calls = []
   392→                    for tc in tool_calls:
   393→                        assistant_tool_calls.append({
   394→                            "id": tc["tool_call_id"],
   395→                            "function": {
   396→                                "name": tc["tool_name"],
   397→                                "arguments": tc["tool_args"]
   398→                            }
   399→                        })
   400→                    messages.append(LLMMessage(
   401→                        role="assistant",
   402→                        content=content_buffer or "",
   403→                        tool_calls=assistant_tool_calls
   404→                    ))
   405→                    content_buffer = ""
   406→
   407→                    # 执行工具
   408→                    t_tools_start = time.time()
   409→                    tool_results = []
   410→                    for tc in tool_calls:
   411→                        tool_name = tc["tool_name"]
   412→                        tool_args = tc["tool_args"]
   413→                        tool_call_id = tc["tool_call_id"]
   414→
   415→                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_call", data={
   416→                            "id": tool_call_id,
   417→                            "name": tool_name,
   418→                            "arguments": tool_args
   419→                        })
   420→
   421→                        t_tool_start = time.time()
   422→
   423→                        # 创建工具上下文
   424→                        tool_context = ToolContext(
   425→                            user_id=context.user_id,
   426→                            user_tier=context.user_tier,
   427→                            profile=context.profile or {},
   428→                            skill_data=context.skill_data or {},
   429→                            skill_id=self._active_skill,
   430→                            scenario_id=self._active_scenario,
   431→                            conversation_id=context.conversation_id
   432→                        )
   433→
   434→                        # v10: 使用 ToolExecutor
   435→                        result = await self.tool_executor.execute(
   436→                            tool_name=tool_name,
   437→                            tool_args=tool_args,
   438→                            context=tool_context,
   439→                            current_message=self._current_message,
   440→                            reload_callback=lambda: self._handle_skill_activation(context)
   441→                        )
   442→
   443→                        # 处理需要重载上下文的工具
   444→                        if result.should_reload_context:
   445→                            # v10.3: 从工具结果中提取激活的 skill/rule
   446→                            if isinstance(result.data, dict):
   447→                                activated_skill = result.data.get("skill")
   448→                                activated_rule = result.data.get("rule")
   449→                                if activated_skill:
   450→                                    self._active_skill = activated_skill
   451→                                    self._active_scenario = activated_rule
   452→                                    logger.info(f"[CoreAgent] Skill activated: {activated_skill}, rule: {activated_rule}")
   453→
   454→                            # 重新构建 System Prompt
   455→                            new_system_prompt = await self._build_system_prompt(
   456→                                self._current_message, context
   457→                            )
   458→                            self._messages[0] = LLMMessage(role="system", content=new_system_prompt)
   459→                            messages[0] = self._messages[0]
   460→                            self._perf_log["phase"] = "phase2"
   461→                            self._perf_log["system_prompt_len"] = len(new_system_prompt)
   462→                            logger.info(f"[CoreAgent] Phase 2 prompt rebuilt, len={len(new_system_prompt)}")
   463→
   464→                        tool_exec_ms = int((time.time() - t_tool_start) * 1000)
   465→                        logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Tool {tool_name}: {tool_exec_ms}ms")
   466→
   467→                        tool_results.append({
   468→                            "tool_call_id": tool_call_id,
   469→                            "result": result.data
   470→                        })
   471→
   472→                        yield AgentEvent(type="tool_result", data={
   473→                            "id": tool_call_id,
   474→                            "name": tool_name,
   475→                            "result": result.data
   476→                        })
   477→
   478→                    tools_total = int((time.time() - t_tools_start) * 1000)
   479→                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] All tools: {tools_total}ms")
   480→
   481→                    for tr in tool_results:
   482→                        result_content = tr["result"]
   483→                        if isinstance(result_content, dict):
   484→                            result_content = json.dumps(result_content, ensure_ascii=False)
   485→                        messages.append(LLMMessage(
   486→                            role="tool",
   487→                            content=str(result_content),
   488→                            tool_call_id=tr["tool_call_id"]
   489→                        ))
   490→                else:
   491→                    self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
   492→                    logger.info(f"[PERF Agent] Done: {self._perf_log}")
   493→                    yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"content": content_buffer})
   494→                    return
   495→
   496→            except Exception as e:
   497→                self.state = AgentState.ERROR
   498→                logger.error(f"Agent error: {e}")
   499→                yield AgentEvent(type="error", data={"error": str(e)})
   500→                return
   501→
   502→        self.state = AgentState.COMPLETED
   503→        yield AgentEvent(type="done", data={"max_iterations_reached": True})
   504→
   505→    async def _handle_skill_activation(self, context: AgentContext) -> None:
   506→        """处理 skill 激活后的上下文重载"""
   507→        if self._context and self._context.user_id != "guest":
   508→            try:
   509→                from stores.profile_cache import get_cached_profile_with_skill
   510→                from uuid import UUID
   511→
   512→                user_id = UUID(self._context.user_id)
   513→                skill = self._active_skill
   514→
   515→                result = await get_cached_profile_with_skill(user_id, skill)
   516→                self._context.profile = result.get("profile", {})
   517→                self._context.skill_data = result.get("skill_data", {})
   518→                context.profile = self._context.profile
   519→                context.skill_data = self._context.skill_data
   520→
   521→                # 加载 session context
   522→                if skill:
   523→                    self._session_context = await self.context_manager.load_session_context(
   524→                        self._context.user_id, skill, self._active_scenario
   525→                    )
   526→                    context.session_context = self._session_context
   527→
   528→                logger.info(f"[CoreAgent] Profile reloaded for skill={skill}")
   529→            except Exception as e:
   530→                logger.warning(f"[CoreAgent] Failed to reload profile: {e}")
   531→
   532→    async def _reload_profile_for_skill(self, skill_id: str) -> None:
   533→        """为指定 skill 重载 profile"""
   534→        if not self._context or self._context.user_id == "guest":
   535→            return
   536→
   537→        try:
   538→            from stores.profile_cache import get_cached_profile_with_skill
   539→            from uuid import UUID
   540→
   541→            user_id = UUID(self._context.user_id)
   542→            result = await get_cached_profile_with_skill(user_id, skill_id)
   543→            self._context.profile = result.get("profile", {})
   544→            self._context.skill_data = result.get("skill_data", {})
   545→
   546→            logger.info(f"[CoreAgent] Profile loaded for skill={skill_id}")
   547→        except Exception as e:
   548→            logger.warning(f"[CoreAgent] Failed to load profile: {e}")
   549→
   550→    def _filter_valid_history(self, history: List[Dict[str, Any]]) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   551→        """过滤历史消息，确保 tool 消息配对完整"""
   552→        if not history:
   553→            return []
   554→
   555→        valid_tool_ids = set()
   556→        for msg in history:
   557→            if msg.get("role") == "assistant" and msg.get("tool_calls"):
   558→                for tc in msg["tool_calls"]:
   559→                    tc_id = tc.get("id")
   560→                    if tc_id:
   561→                        valid_tool_ids.add(tc_id)
   562→
   563→        filtered = []
   564→        for msg in history:
   565→            role = msg.get("role", "user")
   566→            if role == "tool":
   567→                tool_call_id = msg.get("tool_call_id")
   568→                if tool_call_id and tool_call_id in valid_tool_ids:
   569→                    filtered.append(msg)
   570→                else:
   571→                    logger.warning(f"Skipping orphan tool message: {tool_call_id}")
   572→            else:
   573→                filtered.append(msg)
   574→
   575→        return filtered
   576→
   577→    async def _build_initial_messages(
   578→        self,
   579→        message: str,
   580→        context: AgentContext
   581→    ) -> List[LLMMessage]:
   582→        """构建初始消息列表"""
   583→        system_prompt = await self._build_system_prompt(message, context)
   584→
   585→        messages = [LLMMessage(role="system", content=system_prompt)]
   586→
   587→        if context.history:
   588→            filtered_history = self._filter_valid_history(context.history[-10:])
   589→            for msg in filtered_history:
   590→                messages.append(LLMMessage(
   591→                    role=msg.get("role", "user"),
   592→                    content=msg.get("content", ""),
   593→                    tool_call_id=msg.get("tool_call_id"),
   594→                    tool_calls=msg.get("tool_calls")
   595→                ))
   596→
   597→        messages.append(LLMMessage(role="user", content=message))
   598→        return messages
   599→
   600→    async def _build_system_prompt(self, message: str, context: AgentContext) -> str:
   601→        """构建 System Prompt - v10: 使用 PromptBuilder"""
   602→        return await self.prompt_builder.build(
   603→            skill_id=self._active_skill,
   604→            rule_id=self._active_scenario,
   605→            message=message,
   606→            profile=context.profile,
   607→            skill_data=context.skill_data,
   608→            session_context=self._session_context,
   609→            protocol_prompt=context.protocol_prompt
   610→        )
   611→
   612→    def _compute_sop_status(self, context: AgentContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   613→        """计算 SOP 状态"""
   614→        skill_id = self._active_skill
   615→
   616→        needs_birth = skill_requires_birth_info(skill_id) if skill_id else False
   617→        identity = context.profile.get("identity", {}) if context.profile else {}
   618→        birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
   619→        has_birth = bool(birth_info.get("birth_date") or birth_info.get("date"))
   620→
   621→        needs_compute = skill_requires_compute(skill_id) if skill_id else False
   622→        compute_type = get_skill_compute_type(skill_id) if skill_id else None
   623→        actual_compute_type = compute_type or skill_id
   624→
   625→        has_chart = False
   626→        if context.skill_data and actual_compute_type:
   627→            skill_data = context.skill_data.get(actual_compute_type, {})
   628→            has_chart = bool(skill_data.get("chart") or skill_data.get("cards"))
   629→
   630→        # v10: 添加 checkpoint 信息
   631→        checkpoint_info = {}
   632→        if self._session_context and self._session_context.checkpoint:
   633→            cp = self._session_context.checkpoint
   634→            checkpoint_info = {
   635→                "step": cp.step,
   636→                "total_steps": cp.total_steps,
   637→                "has_data": bool(cp.collected_data)
   638→            }
   639→
   640→        return {
   641→            "skill_id": skill_id,
   642→            "needs_birth_info": needs_birth,
   643→            "has_birth_info": has_birth,
   644→            "needs_compute": needs_compute,
   645→            "has_chart_data": has_chart,
   646→            "compute_type": actual_compute_type,
   647→            "ready_for_analysis": (not needs_birth or has_birth) and (not needs_compute or has_chart),
   648→            "checkpoint": checkpoint_info
   649→        }
   650→
   651→    def _get_current_tools(self, context: AgentContext) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
   652→        """获取当前可用工具"""
   653→        if not context.skill and not self._active_skill:
   654→            return get_phase1_tools()
   655→
   656→        skill_id = self._active_skill or context.skill
   657→        tools = ToolRegistry.get_tools_for_skill(skill_id)
   658→        if not tools:
   659→            return get_phase1_tools()
   660→
   661→        # Phase 2: 添加 activate_skill 工具，支持动态切换 skill
   662→        phase1_tools = get_phase1_tools()
   663→        activate_skill_tool = next(
   664→            (t for t in phase1_tools if t.get("function", {}).get("name") == "activate_skill"),
   665→            None
   666→        )
   667→        if activate_skill_tool and activate_skill_tool not in tools:
   668→            tools = tools + [activate_skill_tool]
   669→
   670→        return tools
   671→
   672→
   673→def create_agent(
   674→    llm: Optional[LLMClient] = None,
   675→    max_iterations: int = 10
   676→) -> CoreAgent:
   677→    """创建 CoreAgent 实例"""
   678→    return CoreAgent(llm=llm, max_iterations=max_iterations)
   679→

data.prompt:
我需要探索 VibeLife 项目中 Skill 之间互相调用的当前实现和限制。

背景：用户希望实现复杂场景（如"职场时机"），需要多个 Skill 协同：
- bazi (运势分析)
- zodiac (星象分析)  
- career (职业规划)
- lifecoach (目标追踪)

请帮我探索：

1. **当前限制**：
   - CoreAgent 中 `_active_skill` 是如何管理的？
   - 一次对话中能否激活多个 Skill？
   - Phase 2 执行时，能否调用其他 Skill 的工具？

2. **现有的跨 Skill 能力**：
   - 查找是否有 `requires_skill_data` 配置
   - Skill 是否能读取其他 Skill 的数据（skill_data）？
   - 有没有类似 "sub-skill" 或 "orchestrator" 的模式？

3. **Tool Registry**：
   - `get_tools_for_skill()` 是如何过滤工具的？
   - 是否支持 "global" 工具可被所有 Skill 使用？

4. **潜在方案**：
   - 能否通过修改路由让一个"场景 Skill"调度多个"能力 Skill"？
   - 类似 `career_timing` 这样的新 Skill 如何调用 `bazi.calculate_bazi` 工具？

请提供关键代码路径和架构限制分析。

content.content:
1→"""
     2→SkillLoader v7 - 支持 Agentic + Rule 架构的 Skill 加载器
     3→
     4→v7 架构：
     5→- SKILL.md: 核心定义（专家身份、能力索引、伦理边界）
     6→- rules/*.md: 规则文件（分析要点、输出要求、常见问题）
     7→- scenarios/*.md: (旧架构兼容) MiniSkill 场景文件
     8→- tools/*.py: 工具定义（收集/计算/展示/检索）
     9→
    10→v7.4 新增：
    11→- Skill Management 支持：category, pricing, showcase, subscription 字段
    12→
    13→v7.5 新增：
    14→- 数据库优先元数据加载（skill_catalog 表）
    15→- async 函数支持：load_skill_metadata_async, get_all_skill_metadata_async
    16→- SKILL.md 作为 fallback
    17→"""
    18→import re
    19→import json
    20→import logging
    21→import yaml
    22→from pathlib import Path
    23→from dataclasses import dataclass, field
    24→from typing import Dict, List, Optional, Any
    25→from functools import lru_cache
    26→
    27→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    28→
    29→SKILLS_DIR = Path(__file__).parent.parent.parent / "skills"
    30→
    31→
    32→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    33→# 数据结构
    34→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    35→
    36→@dataclass
    37→class SkillPricing:
    38→    """Skill 定价配置"""
    39→    type: str = "free"  # free | premium | credits
    40→    trial_messages: int = 3
    41→    credits_per_use: Optional[int] = None
    42→
    43→
    44→@dataclass
    45→class SkillShowcase:
    46→    """Skill 展示配置（用于 Skill 市场）"""
    47→    tagline: str = ""
    48→    highlights: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
    49→    preview_image: Optional[str] = None
    50→    demo_prompts: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
    51→
    52→
    53→@dataclass
    54→class SkillSubscription:
    55→    """Skill 订阅配置"""
    56→    auto_subscribe: bool = False
    57→    can_unsubscribe: bool = True
    58→    push_default: bool = True
    59→    min_subscription_days: int = 0
    60→
    61→
    62→@dataclass
    63→class SkillFeature:
    64→    """Skill 功能特性"""
    65→    name: str
    66→    description: str = ""
    67→    icon: str = "📌"
    68→    tier: str = "free"  # free | basic | premium
    69→
    70→
    71→@dataclass
    72→class SkillMetadata:
    73→    """Skill 元数据（用于 Skill Management API）"""
    74→    id: str
    75→    name: str
    76→    description: str
    77→    version: str = "1.0.0"
    78→    category: str = "professional"  # core | default | professional
    79→    icon: str = "💡"
    80→    color: str = "#6B7280"
    81→    triggers: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
    82→    pricing: SkillPricing = field(default_factory=SkillPricing)
    83→    features: List[SkillFeature] = field(default_factory=list)
    84→    showcase: SkillShowcase = field(default_factory=SkillShowcase)
    85→    subscription: SkillSubscription = field(default_factory=SkillSubscription)
    86→
    87→    def to_dict(self) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    88→        """转换为 API 响应格式"""
    89→        return {
    90→            "id": self.id,
    91→            "name": self.name,
    92→            "description": self.description,
    93→            "version": self.version,
    94→            "category": self.category,
    95→            "icon": self.icon,
    96→            "color": self.color,
    97→            "triggers": self.triggers,
    98→            "pricing": {
    99→                "type": self.pricing.type,
   100→                "trial_messages": self.pricing.trial_messages,
   101→                "credits_per_use": self.pricing.credits_per_use,
   102→            },
   103→            "features": [
   104→                {"name": f.name, "description": f.description, "icon": f.icon, "tier": f.tier}
   105→                for f in self.features
   106→            ],
   107→            "showcase": {
   108→                "tagline": self.showcase.tagline,
   109→                "highlights": self.showcase.highlights,
   110→                "preview_image": self.showcase.preview_image,
   111→                "demo_prompts": self.showcase.demo_prompts,
   112→            },
   113→            "subscription": {
   114→                "auto_subscribe": self.subscription.auto_subscribe,
   115→                "can_unsubscribe": self.subscription.can_unsubscribe,
   116→                "push_default": self.subscription.push_default,
   117→            },
   118→        }
   119→
   120→
   121→@dataclass
   122→class SkillConfig:
   123→    """Skill 核心配置（从 SKILL.md 加载）"""
   124→    id: str
   125→    name: str
   126→    description: str
   127→    expert_persona: str
   128→    scenarios: Dict[str, List[str]]  # {entry: [...], standard: [...], professional: [...]}
   129→    ethics: Dict[str, Any]
   130→    tools: List[str]
   131→    default_scenario: str = "basic_reading"
   132→    triggers: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
   133→    global_tools: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # 需要的全局工具
   134→    # v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
   135→    requires_birth_info: bool = False  # 是否需要出生信息
   136→    requires_compute: bool = False     # 是否需要计算（排盘）
   137→    compute_type: Optional[str] = None # 计算类型：bazi/zodiac/tarot，None 表示使用自身
   138→    compute_tool: Optional[str] = None # 计算工具名，None 时使用默认约定 calculate_{compute_type}
   139→    collect_tool: Optional[str] = None # 收集工具名，None 时使用默认约定 request_info
   140→    external_tools: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # v7.3: 从其他 skill 导入的工具
   141→    # v2.2: Profile 注入配置
   142→    requires_skill_data: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # 需要的 skill_data，空列表表示只需自身
   143→
   144→
   145→@dataclass
   146→class ServiceItem:
   147→    """服务项（用于服务目录展示）"""
   148→    scenario_id: str
   149→    name: str
   150→    icon: str
   151→    description: str
   152→    tier: str  # entry/standard/professional
   153→    billing: str  # 免费/基础/高级
   154→    highlights: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)  # 价值点
   155→
   156→
   157→@dataclass
   158→class ScenarioConfig:
   159→    """场景配置（从 scenarios/*.md 加载）"""
   160→    id: str
   161→    name: str
   162→    level: str  # entry/standard/professional
   163→    billing: str  # free/basic/premium
   164→    description: str
   165→    triggers: Dict[str, List[str]]  # {primary: [...], secondary: [...]}
   166→    prerequisites: List[str]
   167→    sop: List[Dict[str, Any]]  # SOP 阶段列表
   168→    knowledge_config: Dict[str, Any]  # 知识检索配置
   169→    output_config: Dict[str, Any]  # 输出配置
   170→    tools: List[str]
   171→
   172→
   173→@dataclass
   174→class ToolMetadata:
   175→    """工具元数据"""
   176→    name: str
   177→    description: str
   178→    tool_type: str  # collect/calculate/display/search
   179→    card_type: Optional[str] = None
   180→    card_props_schema: Optional[Dict] = None
   181→    parameters: Dict[str, Any] = field(default_factory=dict)
   182→    when_to_call: Optional[str] = None
   183→
   184→
   185→@dataclass
   186→class RuleConfig:
   187→    """规则配置（从 rules/*.md 加载）- v7 新增"""
   188→    id: str
   189→    name: str
   190→    impact: str  # CRITICAL/HIGH/MEDIUM/LOW

data.prompt:
我需要探索 VibeLife 项目中 Skill 之间互相调用的当前实现和限制。

背景：用户希望实现复杂场景（如"职场时机"），需要多个 Skill 协同：
- bazi (运势分析)
- zodiac (星象分析)  
- career (职业规划)
- lifecoach (目标追踪)

请帮我探索：

1. **当前限制**：
   - CoreAgent 中 `_active_skill` 是如何管理的？
   - 一次对话中能否激活多个 Skill？
   - Phase 2 执行时，能否调用其他 Skill 的工具？

2. **现有的跨 Skill 能力**：
   - 查找是否有 `requires_skill_data` 配置
   - Skill 是否能读取其他 Skill 的数据（skill_data）？
   - 有没有类似 "sub-skill" 或 "orchestrator" 的模式？

3. **Tool Registry**：
   - `get_tools_for_skill()` 是如何过滤工具的？
   - 是否支持 "global" 工具可被所有 Skill 使用？

4. **潜在方案**：
   - 能否通过修改路由让一个"场景 Skill"调度多个"能力 Skill"？
   - 类似 `career_timing` 这样的新 Skill 如何调用 `bazi.calculate_bazi` 工具？

请提供关键代码路径和架构限制分析。

content.content:
200→# 解析函数
   201→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   202→
   203→def parse_frontmatter(text: str) -> tuple[Dict, str]:
   204→    """解析 YAML frontmatter（支持嵌套对象）"""
   205→    pattern = r'^---\s*\n(.*?)\n---\s*\n(.*)$'
   206→    match = re.match(pattern, text, re.DOTALL)
   207→    if not match:
   208→        return {}, text
   209→
   210→    frontmatter_str, content = match.groups()
   211→
   212→    # 使用 YAML 解析以支持嵌套对象
   213→    try:
   214→        metadata = yaml.safe_load(frontmatter_str) or {}
   215→    except yaml.YAMLError as e:
   216→        logger.warning(f"YAML parse error in frontmatter: {e}, falling back to simple parse")
   217→        # 回退到简单解析
   218→        metadata = {}
   219→        current_key = None
   220→        current_list = None
   221→
   222→        for line in frontmatter_str.strip().split('\n'):
   223→            stripped = line.strip()
   224→            if not stripped:
   225→                continue
   226→            if stripped.startswith('- ') and current_key:
   227→                if current_list is None:
   228→                    current_list = []
   229→                current_list.append(stripped[2:].strip())
   230→                metadata[current_key] = current_list
   231→            elif ':' in line and not line.startswith(' '):
   232→                current_list = None
   233→                key, value = line.split(':', 1)
   234→                current_key = key.strip()
   235→                value = value.strip()
   236→                if value in ('|', ''):
   237→                    continue
   238→                elif value.lower() == 'true':
   239→                    metadata[current_key] = True
   240→                elif value.lower() == 'false':
   241→                    metadata[current_key] = False
   242→                else:
   243→                    metadata[current_key] = value
   244→
   245→    return metadata, content.strip()
   246→
   247→
   248→def parse_skill_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   249→    """解析 SKILL.md 内容，提取结构化信息
   250→
   251→    支持两种触发词格式：
   252→    1. 旧格式：frontmatter 中的 triggers: 列表
   253→    2. 新格式：description 中的 "触发词：xxx、xxx、xxx"
   254→    """
   255→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   256→
   257→    # 从 frontmatter 获取触发词（旧格式）
   258→    triggers = metadata.get("triggers", [])
   259→
   260→    # 如果 frontmatter 没有 triggers，尝试从 description 中提取（新格式）
   261→    if not triggers:
   262→        description = metadata.get("description", "")
   263→        # 匹配 "触发词：xxx、xxx、xxx" 或 "触发词:xxx,xxx,xxx"
   264→        trigger_match = re.search(r'触发词[：:]\s*([^。.]+)', description)
   265→        if trigger_match:
   266→            trigger_str = trigger_match.group(1)
   267→            # 支持顿号、逗号分隔
   268→            triggers = [t.strip() for t in re.split(r'[、,，]', trigger_str) if t.strip()]
   269→
   270→    result = {
   271→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   272→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   273→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   274→        "triggers": triggers,
   275→        "default_scenario": metadata.get("default_scenario", "basic_reading"),
   276→        "global_tools": metadata.get("global_tools", []),  # 从 frontmatter 读取
   277→        # v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
   278→        "requires_birth_info": metadata.get("requires_birth_info", False),
   279→        "requires_compute": metadata.get("requires_compute", False),
   280→        "compute_type": metadata.get("compute_type", None),
   281→        "compute_tool": metadata.get("compute_tool", None),
   282→        "collect_tool": metadata.get("collect_tool", None),
   283→        "external_tools": metadata.get("external_tools", []),  # v7.3
   284→        # v2.2: Profile 注入配置
   285→        "requires_skill_data": metadata.get("requires_skill_data", []),
   286→    }
   287→
   288→    # 提取专家身份
   289→    expert_match = re.search(r'## 专家身份\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   290→    result["expert_persona"] = expert_match.group(1).strip() if expert_match else ""
   291→
   292→    # 提取场景目录
   293→    scenarios = {"entry": [], "standard": [], "professional": []}
   294→    for level in scenarios.keys():
   295→        pattern = rf'### {level.capitalize()}.*?\n\|.*?\n\|.*?\n((?:\|.*?\n)*)'
   296→        match = re.search(pattern, content, re.IGNORECASE | re.DOTALL)
   297→        if match:
   298→            for row in match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   299→                cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   300→                if len(cols) >= 2:
   301→                    scenarios[level].append(cols[1])  # 文件名
   302→    result["scenarios"] = scenarios
   303→
   304→    # 提取伦理边界
   305→    ethics = {"forbidden": [], "sensitive": [], "principles": []}
   306→    forbidden_match = re.search(r'### 绝对禁止\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   307→    if forbidden_match:
   308→        ethics["forbidden"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in forbidden_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   309→    result["ethics"] = ethics
   310→
   311→    # 提取工具列表
   312→    tools = []
   313→    tools_match = re.search(r'## 工具列表\s*\n\|.*?\n\|.*?\n((?:\|.*?\n)*)', content)
   314→    if tools_match:
   315→        for row in tools_match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   316→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   317→            if len(cols) >= 1:
   318→                tools.append(cols[0])
   319→    result["tools"] = tools
   320→
   321→    return result
   322→
   323→
   324→def parse_scenario_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   325→    """解析 scenario.md 内容"""
   326→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   327→
   328→    result = {
   329→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   330→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   331→        "level": metadata.get("level", "entry"),
   332→        "billing": metadata.get("billing", "free"),
   333→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   334→    }
   335→
   336→    # 提取触发条件
   337→    triggers = {"primary": [], "secondary": []}
   338→    primary_match = re.search(r'\*\*主要触发词\*\*:\s*(.*?)(?:\n|$)', content)
   339→    if primary_match:
   340→        triggers["primary"] = [t.strip() for t in primary_match.group(1).split(',')]
   341→    secondary_match = re.search(r'\*\*次要触发词\*\*:\s*(.*?)(?:\n|$)', content)
   342→    if secondary_match:
   343→        triggers["secondary"] = [t.strip() for t in secondary_match.group(1).split(',')]
   344→    result["triggers"] = triggers
   345→
   346→    # 提取前置要求
   347→    prereq_match = re.search(r'## 前置要求\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   348→    result["prerequisites"] = []
   349→    if prereq_match:
   350→        result["prerequisites"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in prereq_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   351→
   352→    # 提取 SOP 阶段
   353→    sop = []
   354→    phase_pattern = r'### Phase (\d+):\s*(.*?)\n(.*?)(?=### Phase|\Z)'
   355→    for match in re.finditer(phase_pattern, content, re.DOTALL):
   356→        phase_num, phase_name, phase_content = match.groups()
   357→        phase = {
   358→            "phase": int(phase_num),
   359→            "name": phase_name.strip(),
   360→            "content": phase_content.strip()
   361→        }
   362→        # 提取类型
   363→        type_match = re.search(r'\*\*类型\*\*:\s*(\w+)', phase_content)
   364→        if type_match:
   365→            phase["type"] = type_match.group(1)
   366→        sop.append(phase)
   367→    result["sop"] = sop
   368→
   369→    # 提取工具列表
   370→    tools_match = re.search(r'\*\*使用工具\*\*:\s*\n((?:- .*?\n)*)', content)
   371→    result["tools"] = []
   372→    if tools_match:
   373→        result["tools"] = [l[2:].strip() for l in tools_match.group(1).strip().split('\n')]
   374→
   375→    # 知识检索配置
   376→    result["knowledge_config"] = {}
   377→    result["output_config"] = {}
   378→
   379→    return result
   380→
   381→
   382→def parse_rule_md(text: str) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   383→    """解析 rules/*.md 内容 - v7 新增"""
   384→    metadata, content = parse_frontmatter(text)
   385→
   386→    # 解析 tags（支持逗号分隔的字符串或列表）
   387→    tags_raw = metadata.get("tags", [])
   388→    if isinstance(tags_raw, str):
   389→        tags = [t.strip() for t in re.split(r'[,，、]', tags_raw) if t.strip()]
   390→    else:
   391→        tags = tags_raw
   392→
   393→    result = {
   394→        "id": metadata.get("id", ""),
   395→        "name": metadata.get("name", ""),
   396→        "impact": metadata.get("impact", "MEDIUM"),
   397→        "impact_description": metadata.get("impactDescription", ""),
   398→        "tags": tags,
   399→        "content": content,
   400→    }
   401→
   402→    # 提取分析要点表格
   403→    analysis_steps = []
   404→    table_match = re.search(r'## 分析要点\s*\n\|[^\n]+\n\|[-\s|]+\n((?:\|[^\n]+\n)*)', content)
   405→    if table_match:
   406→        for row in table_match.group(1).strip().split('\n'):
   407→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   408→            if len(cols) >= 4:
   409→                analysis_steps.append({
   410→                    "step": cols[0],
   411→                    "point": cols[1],
   412→                    "query": cols[2],
   413→                    "priority": cols[3],
   414→                })
   415→    result["analysis_steps"] = analysis_steps
   416→
   417→    # 提取输出要求
   418→    output_match = re.search(r'## 输出要求\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   419→    result["output_requirements"] = output_match.group(1).strip() if output_match else ""
   420→
   421→    # 提取常见问题
   422→    faq_match = re.search(r'## 常见问题\s*\n(.*?)(?=\n## |\Z)', content, re.DOTALL)
   423→    result["common_questions"] = faq_match.group(1).strip() if faq_match else ""
   424→
   425→    return result
   426→
   427→
   428→def parse_skill_services(text: str) -> Dict[str, List[Dict[str, Any]]]:
   429→    """解析 SKILL.md 中的服务目录，提取展示信息"""
   430→    services = {"entry": [], "standard": [], "professional": []}
   431→
   432→    tier_map = {
   433→        "entry": "entry",
   434→        "standard": "standard",
   435→        "professional": "professional"
   436→    }
   437→
   438→    for tier_name, tier_key in tier_map.items():
   439→        # 匹配表格头和内容
   440→        pattern = rf'### {tier_name.capitalize()}.*?\n\|[^\n]+\n\|[-\s|]+\n((?:\|[^\n]+\n)*)'
   441→        match = re.search(pattern, text, re.IGNORECASE | re.DOTALL)
   442→        if not match:
   443→            continue
   444→
   445→        table_content = match.group(1).strip()
   446→        if not table_content:
   447→            continue
   448→
   449→        for row in table_content.split('\n'):
   450→            cols = [c.strip() for c in row.split('|')[1:-1]]
   451→            if len(cols) < 7:  # 至少需要 7 列（场景、文件、触发词、计费、展示名称、图标、简介）
   452→                continue
   453→
   454→            service = {
   455→                "scenario_id": cols[1].replace('.md', '') if cols[1] else cols[0].lower().replace(' ', '_'),
   456→                "name": cols[4] if len(cols) > 4 and cols[4] else cols[0],
   457→                "icon": cols[5] if len(cols) > 5 and cols[5] else "📌",
   458→                "description": cols[6] if len(cols) > 6 and cols[6] else "",
   459→                "tier": tier_key,
   460→                "billing": cols[3] if len(cols) > 3 else "免费",
   461→                "highlights": []
   462→            }
   463→
   464→            # 解析价值点（第8列，如果存在）
   465→            if len(cols) > 7 and cols[7]:
   466→                service["highlights"] = [h.strip() for h in cols[7].split(',')]
   467→
   468→            services[tier_key].append(service)
   469→
   470→    return services
   471→
   472→
   473→def get_skill_services(skill_id: str) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
   474→    """获取 Skill 的服务目录数据（用于 show_skill_services 工具）"""
   475→    skill_path = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "SKILL.md"
   476→    if not skill_path.exists():
   477→        return None
   478→
   479→    text = skill_path.read_text(encoding='utf-8')
   480→    metadata, _ = parse_frontmatter(text)
   481→    services = parse_skill_services(text)
   482→
   483→    return {
   484→        "skill_id": skill_id,
   485→        "skill_name": metadata.get("name", skill_id),
   486→        "description": metadata.get("description", ""),
   487→        "services": services
   488→    }
   489→
   490→
   491→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   492→# 加载函数
   493→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   494→
   495→@lru_cache(maxsize=32)
   496→def load_skill(skill_id: str) -> Optional[SkillConfig]:
   497→    """加载 Skill 核心配置"""
   498→    skill_path = SKILLS_DIR / skill_id / "SKILL.md"
   499→    if not skill_path.exists():

But you MUST refuse to improve or augment the code. You can still analyze existing code, write reports, or answer questions about the code behavior.

=== /home/aiscend/work/vibelife/apps/api/skills/mindfulness/SKILL.md ===
---
name: mindfulness
description: |
  正念导师。3分钟内让你平静下来，融合 Headspace/Calm 产品精髓。
  触发词：正念、冥想、呼吸、放松、焦虑、睡不着、静心、calm、深呼吸。
category: wellness
---

# 正念导师 Skill

## 专家身份

我是一位温和、沉稳的正念导师。我不说教，只引导。我的语言简洁，充满留白。

**核心理念**：正念不是让你变得更好，而是让你看见当下。

**知识来源优先级**：
1. Headspace/Calm 产品设计精髓
2. 正念认知疗法（MBCT）经典
3. 实战验证的引导脚本

**引导原则**：极简（每句≤10字）、留白（...表停顿）、允许（走神没关系）、不说教

---

## 核心能力索引

| 能力 | 优先级 | 规则文件 | 触发场景 |
|-----|-------|---------|---------|
| 呼吸锚定 | CRITICAL | `rules/breathing.md` | 正念、冥想、呼吸、calm |
| STOP急救 | CRITICAL | `rules/stop.md` | 焦虑、着急、冷静、要崩溃 |
| 478呼吸 | HIGH | `rules/breathing-478.md` | 紧张、快速平静 |
| 晨间意图 | HIGH | `rules/morning.md` | 早安、晨间、开始新的一天 |
| 睡前放松 | HIGH | `rules/sleep.md` | 睡不着、失眠、睡前、晚安 |
| RAIN情绪 | HIGH | `rules/rain.md` | 难过、悲伤、愤怒、委屈 |
| 身体扫描 | MEDIUM | `rules/body-scan.md` | 身体紧绷、放松身体 |
| 专注启动 | MEDIUM | `rules/focus.md` | 开始工作、专注、集中 |
| 专家收尾 | MEDIUM | `rules/integration.md` | 其他 Skill 对话结束后（系统触发） |

**路由策略**：LLM 语义理解用户意图，匹配最相关能力，按需加载规则文件

# Lifecoach

## 专家身份

我是融合多元智慧的人生教练，支持多种教练方法论。

**核心信念**：
- 改变行为前先改变身份
- 所有行为都是目标导向的
- 持续陪伴比一次性指导更有效
- 东西方智慧各有所长，因人而异

**知识来源**：Dan Koe、Stephen Covey、王阳明、袁了凡

---

## 对话原则（最重要）

### 1. 先连接，后诊断

=== /home/aiscend/work/vibelife/apps/api/skills/jungastro/SKILL.md ===
---
name: jungastro
description: 荣格心理占星分析师。基于 Carl Jung 分析心理学框架，将占星作为心理自我认知工具。不预测命运，而是揭示内在心理模式、成长机会和个体化路径。触发词：荣格、荣格占星、心理占星、心理分析、阴影整合、个体化、心理功能、原型分析、深层心理、内在冲突、心理画像。
category: self-awareness
# v7.1: SOP 配置驱动
requires_birth_info: true
requires_compute: true
compute_type: zodiac
compute_tool: calculate_zodiac
collect_tool: collect_birth_info
# v7.3: 从 zodiac skill 导入计算工具
external_tools: [calculate_zodiac]
# v2.2: Profile 注入 - 声明需要的 skill_data
requires_skill_data: [bazi, zodiac]
---

# 荣格心理占星 Skill

## 专家身份

我是融合 Liz Greene、Howard Sasportas 心理占星学派的分析师，基于 Carl Jung 的分析心理学框架。

**⚠️ 强制工具调用规则（必须遵守）**：
- **禁止编造星盘数据**！必须调用 `calculate_zodiac` 工具计算
- 用户提供出生信息后，**必须**先调用 `calculate_zodiac(birth_date, birth_time, birth_place)`
- 计算完成后，**必须**调用 `show_psychological_portrait` 或其他展示工具
- **禁止**在用户已提供出生信息时调用 `collect_birth_info`
- **禁止**在文本中直接编写分析结果而不调用工具

**核心理念**：
- 星盘是心灵地图，不是命运剧本
- 行星是心理功能，不是外在力量
- 困难相位是成长机会，不是灾难预言
- 意识带来改变，觉知转化"命运"

**知识来源优先级**：
1. Liz Greene《Saturn》《The Astrology of Fate》
2. Howard Sasportas《The Twelve Houses》《The Gods of Change》
3. 知识库检索结果（search_db）

---

## 核心能力索引

| 能力 | 优先级 | 规则文件 | 触发场景 |
|-----|-------|---------|---------|
| 心理画像 | CRITICAL | `rules/psychological-portrait.md` | 分析我的心理、深层性格、心理结构 |
| 阴影整合 | HIGH | `rules/shadow-work.md` | 阴影、内在冲突、困难相位、冥王星 |
| 个体化分析 | HIGH | `rules/individuation.md` | 成长方向、人生阶段、土星回归、中年危机 |
| 关系动力学 | MEDIUM | `rules/relationship-dynamics.md` | 关系模式、投射、合盘心理、7宫分析 |

**使用方式**：匹配用户意图后，读取对应规则文件获取详细分析步骤。

---

content.content:
1→"""
     2→Tool Executor v10 - 工具执行器
     3→
     4→从 core.py 拆分出来的工具执行逻辑，支持：
     5→- 统一工具执行
     6→- 自动 checkpoint 保存
     7→- Phase 1 路由工具处理
     8→- 工具结果处理
     9→
    10→与 ContextManager 协作：
    11→- 工具执行后自动保存 checkpoint
    12→- 收集工具数据自动累积
    13→"""
    14→import json
    15→import logging
    16→from dataclasses import dataclass
    17→from typing import Optional, Dict, Any, Callable, Awaitable
    18→
    19→from .tool_registry import ToolRegistry, ToolContext
    20→from .skill_loader import load_skill, get_skill_rules, load_rule
    21→from .routing_config import get_protocol_meta
    22→
    23→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    24→
    25→
    26→@dataclass
    27→class ToolResult:
    28→    """工具执行结果"""
    29→    data: Dict[str, Any]
    30→    should_checkpoint: bool = False
    31→    checkpoint_data: Optional[Dict[str, Any]] = None
    32→    should_reload_context: bool = False  # 是否需要重新加载上下文
    33→
    34→
    35→class ToolExecutor:
    36→    """
    37→    工具执行器
    38→
    39→    职责：
    40→    1. 执行工具调用
    41→    2. 处理 Phase 1 路由工具
    42→    3. 判断是否需要保存 checkpoint
    43→    4. 返回执行结果
    44→    """
    45→
    46→    # 需要保存 checkpoint 的工具
    47→    CHECKPOINT_TOOLS = {
    48→        "save_checkpoint",
    49→        "write_state",
    50→        "append_to_list",
    51→        "save_skill_data",
    52→        "request_info",  # 收集工具
    53→    }
    54→
    55→    # 收集型工具（返回的数据需要累积）
    56→    COLLECT_TOOLS = {
    57→        "request_info",
    58→        "ask_user_question",
    59→    }
    60→
    61→    def __init__(self):
    62→        from .context_manager import get_context_manager
    63→        self.context_manager = get_context_manager()
    64→
    65→    async def execute(
    66→        self,
    67→        tool_name: str,
    68→        tool_args: str,
    69→        context: ToolContext,
    70→        current_message: str = "",
    71→        reload_callback: Optional[Callable[[], Awaitable[None]]] = None
    72→    ) -> ToolResult:
    73→        """
    74→        执行工具调用
    75→
    76→        Args:
    77→            tool_name: 工具名称
    78→            tool_args: 工具参数（JSON 字符串）
    79→            context: 工具上下文
    80→            current_message: 当前用户消息（用于路由）
    81→            reload_callback: 上下文重载回调（用于 activate_skill 后重新构建 prompt）
    82→
    83→        Returns:
    84→            ToolResult 包含执行结果和 checkpoint 信息
    85→        """
    86→        try:
    87→            args = json.loads(tool_args) if tool_args else {}
    88→        except json.JSONDecodeError:
    89→            args = {}
    90→
    91→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    92→        # Phase 1 路由工具
    93→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    94→
    95→        if tool_name == "activate_skill":
    96→            return await self._handle_activate_skill(args, context, current_message, reload_callback)
    97→
    98→        if tool_name == "show_protocol_invitation":
    99→            return await self._handle_show_protocol_invitation(args, context)
   100→
   101→        if tool_name == "show_skill_intro":
   102→            return await self._handle_show_skill_intro(args, context)
   103→
   104→        if tool_name == "recommend_skills":
   105→            return await self._handle_recommend_skills(args, context)
   106→
   107→        # 兼容旧的 use_skill
   108→        if tool_name == "use_skill":
   109→            new_args = {
   110→                "skill": args.get("skill"),
   111→                "rule": args.get("scenario"),
   112→            }
   113→            return await self._handle_activate_skill(new_args, context, current_message, reload_callback)
   114→
   115→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   116→        # Session 管理工具（v10 新增）
   117→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   118→
   119→        if tool_name == "save_checkpoint":
   120→            return await self._handle_save_checkpoint(args, context)
   121→
   122→        if tool_name == "read_session_context":
   123→            return await self._handle_read_session_context(args, context)
   124→
   125→        if tool_name == "add_finding":
   126→            return await self._handle_add_finding(args, context)
   127→
   128→        if tool_name == "complete_session":
   129→            return await self._handle_complete_session(args, context)
   130→
   131→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   132→        # 通用工具执行
   133→        # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   134→
   135→        if ToolRegistry.has_handler(tool_name):
   136→            result = await ToolRegistry.execute(tool_name, args, context)
   137→
   138→            # 判断是否需要保存 checkpoint
   139→            should_checkpoint = tool_name in self.CHECKPOINT_TOOLS
   140→            checkpoint_data = None
   141→
   142→            if tool_name in self.COLLECT_TOOLS and result.get("status") == "success":
   143→                # 收集工具的数据需要累积
   144→                checkpoint_data = {
   145→                    "tool": tool_name,
   146→                    "data": result
   147→                }
   148→
   149→            return ToolResult(
   150→                data=result,
   151→                should_checkpoint=should_checkpoint,
   152→                checkpoint_data=checkpoint_data
   153→            )
   154→
   155→        # 未知工具
   156→        logger.warning(f"[ToolExecutor] Unknown tool: {tool_name}")
   157→        return ToolResult(
   158→            data={
   159→                "status": "unknown_tool",
   160→                "tool": tool_name,
   161→                "message": f"工具 {tool_name} 暂未实现"
   162→            }
   163→        )
   164→
   165→    async def _handle_activate_skill(
   166→        self,
   167→        args: Dict[str, Any],
   168→        context: ToolContext,
   169→        current_message: str,
   170→        reload_callback: Optional[Callable[[], Awaitable[None]]]
   171→    ) -> ToolResult:
   172→        """处理 activate_skill 工具"""
   173→        skill = args.get("skill")
   174→        rule = args.get("rule")
   175→
   176→        if not skill:
   177→            return ToolResult(
   178→                data={"status": "error", "message": "No skill specified"}
   179→            )
   180→
   181→        # 如果没有指定 rule，尝试自动匹配
   182→        if not rule and current_message:
   183→            rule = await self._route_rule(skill, current_message)
   184→            if rule:
   185→                logger.info(f"[ToolExecutor] Auto-routed rule: {rule}")
   186→
   187→        # 同步 skill 到数据库
   188→        if context.conversation_id:
   189→            try:
   190→                from stores.conversation_repo import update_conversation_skill
   191→                from uuid import UUID
   192→                conv_id = UUID(context.conversation_id)
   193→                await update_conversation_skill(conv_id, skill)
   194→            except Exception as e:
   195→                logger.warning(f"[ToolExecutor] Failed to sync skill to DB: {e}")
   196→
   197→        result = {
   198→            "status": "activated",
   199→            "skill": skill,
   200→            "rule": rule,
   201→            "message": f"已激活 {skill} 技能" + (f"，规则: {rule}" if rule else "")
   202→        }
   203→
   204→        # 触发上下文重载
   205→        if reload_callback:
   206→            await reload_callback()
   207→
   208→        return ToolResult(
   209→            data=result,
   210→            should_reload_context=True
   211→        )
   212→
   213→    async def _route_rule(self, skill_id: str, message: str) -> Optional[str]:
   214→        """自动路由规则"""
   215→        skill = load_skill(skill_id)
   216→        if not skill:
   217→            return None
   218→
   219→        rules = get_skill_rules(skill_id)
   220→        if not rules:
   221→            return skill.default_scenario
   222→
   223→        # v10.1: 让 LLM 选择，这里返回 None
   224→        return None
   225→
   226→    async def _handle_show_protocol_invitation(
   227→        self,
   228→        args: Dict[str, Any],
   229→        context: ToolContext
   230→    ) -> ToolResult:
   231→        """处理 show_protocol_invitation 工具"""
   232→        protocol_id = args.get("protocol_id")
   233→
   234→        if not protocol_id:
   235→            return ToolResult(
   236→                data={"status": "error", "message": "No protocol_id specified"}
   237→            )
   238→
   239→        meta = get_protocol_meta(protocol_id) or {}
   240→
   241→        return ToolResult(
   242→            data={
   243→                "status": "success",
   244→                "card_type": "protocol_invitation",
   245→                "protocol_id": protocol_id,
   246→                "title": meta.get("name", protocol_id),
   247→                "description": meta.get("description", ""),
   248→                "estimated_time": meta.get("estimated_time", "10分钟"),
   249→                "total_steps": meta.get("total_steps", 6),
   250→            }

version: "2.0"
skill_id: mindfulness
description: 正念导师工具 - 练习引导、记录统计

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# 动作型工具
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
action:
  - name: start_mindfulness_session
    description: |
      开始正念练习会话。
      何时调用：
      - 用户请求做正念/冥想/呼吸练习时
      - 系统检测到情绪波动建议练习时
      - 其他 Skill 结束后触发收尾练习时
    parameters:
      - name: practice_type
        type: string
        required: true
        description: 练习类型
        enum:
          - breathing        # 呼吸锚定 (1-3分钟)
          - breathing_478    # 478呼吸 (2分钟)
          - stop             # STOP急救 (1分钟)
          - body_scan        # 身体扫描 (3分钟)
          - morning          # 晨间意图 (3分钟)
          - focus            # 专注启动 (2分钟)
          - sleep            # 睡前放松 (5-10分钟)
          - rain             # RAIN情绪处理 (5-10分钟)
          - integration      # 专家收尾 (2分钟)
      - name: duration_minutes
        type: integer
        required: false
        description: 练习时长（分钟）
        default: 3
      - name: context
        type: object
        required: false
        description: |
          上下文信息：
          - trigger: user/schedule/emotion_detect/expert_handoff
          - preceding_skill: bazi/zodiac/tarot/career
          - emotion_detected: anxiety/anger/sadness
      - name: mood_before
        type: integer
        required: false
        description: 练习前情绪评分 (1-5)

  - name: complete_mindfulness_session
    description: |
=== /home/aiscend/work/vibelife/apps/api/skills/lifecoach/tools/tools.yaml ===
version: "3.0"
skill_id: lifecoach

tools:
  # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  # 数据工具 (通用 - 所有方法论共享)
  # ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
  - name: read_lifecoach_state
    description: |
      读取用户的人生地图状态。支持读取以下部分：
      - system: 系统配置（方法论选择）
      - north_star: 北极星（愿景、反愿景、使命、原则）
      - goals: 核心目标/角色目标
      - roadmap: 路线图（年度、季度）
      - current: 当前焦点（月度项目、周大石头、每日行动）
      - identity: 身份设计
      - progress: 进度追踪
      - journal: 复盘日志/功过格
    type: data
    when_to_call: 每次对话开始时，或需要了解用户当前状态时
    parameters:
      - name: sections
        type: array
        description: 要读取的部分
        default: ["system", "north_star", "current", "progress"]

  - name: write_lifecoach_state
    description: 写入用户的人生地图状态。支持局部更新，深度合并。
    type: data
    when_to_call: 完成愿景设计、目标设定、计划制定后保存状态
    parameters:
      - name: section
        type: string
        required: true
        enum: [system, north_star, goals, roadmap, current, identity, progress]
        description: 要写入的部分
      - name: data
        type: object
        required: true
        description: 要写入的数据

  - name: add_journal_entry
    description: 添加日志条目（复盘/功过格/洞察）
    type: data
    when_to_call: 用户完成复盘或有重要洞察时
    parameters:
      - name: entry_type
        type: string
        required: true
        enum: [daily, weekly, monthly, insight, milestone]
=== /home/aiscend/work/vibelife/apps/api/skills/jungastro/tools/tools.yaml ===
version: "1.0"
skill_id: jungastro

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# 收集型工具
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
collect:
  - name: collect_birth_info
    description: |
      收集用户的出生信息以进行荣格心理占星分析。
      当用户想要进行心理占星分析但尚未提供出生信息时调用。
    card_type: collect_form
    fallback_type: form  # V7.1: 无专用卡片时降级到表单视图
    card_props:
      title: "心理占星分析"
      subtitle: "请提供您的出生信息"
      form_fields:
        - name: birth_date
          type: date
          required: true
          label: 出生日期
        - name: birth_time
          type: time
          required: true
          label: 出生时间
          hint: 出生时间影响上升星座和宫位，建议查询出生证明
        - name: birth_location
          type: location
          required: true
          label: 出生地点
    parameters:
      - name: question
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 用户的问题或困惑
    when_to_call: 用户想进行心理占星分析但没有提供出生信息时

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# 展示型工具
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
display:
  - name: show_skill_intro
    description: |
      展示 Skill 介绍卡片。用于首次使用或用户想了解功能时。
      卡片包含：功能介绍、快速开始提示、订阅状态。
    type: display
    card_type: skill_intro
    when_to_call: |
      - 用户首次使用此 Skill 时
      - 用户问"这个能做什么"、"有什么功能"时

version: "1.0"
skill_id: tarot

# 计算型工具
compute:
  - name: draw_tarot_cards
    description: |
      抽塔罗牌。根据用户问题和选择的牌阵抽取塔罗牌。
    card_type: tarot_spread
    fallback_type: list  # V7.1: 无专用卡片时降级到列表视图
    when_to_call: |
      - 用户说"帮我抽牌"
      - 用户说"塔罗占卜"
      - 用户想进行塔罗牌阵
    parameters:
      - name: spread_type
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 牌阵类型
        enum:
          - single
          - three
          - celtic_cross
        default: single
      - name: question
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 用户的问题

# 展示型工具
display:
  - name: show_skill_intro
    description: |
      展示 Skill 介绍卡片。用于首次使用或用户想了解功能时。
      卡片包含：功能介绍、快速开始提示、订阅状态。
    type: display
    card_type: skill_intro
    when_to_call: |
      - 用户首次使用此 Skill 时
      - 用户问"这个能做什么"、"有什么功能"时
      - 用户说"介绍一下"、"帮助"时
    parameters:
      - name: variant
        type: string
        enum: [full, compact, mini]
        default: compact
        description: 卡片变体（full=完整版, compact=精简版, mini=迷你版）
      - name: reason
        type: string
        description: 展示原因（如"首次使用"、"功能介绍"）

version: "2.0"
skill_id: bazi

# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
# 收集型工具
# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
collect:
  - name: collect_bazi_info
    description: |
      收集用户的出生信息以进行八字分析。
      当用户想要进行八字分析但尚未提供出生信息时调用。
    card_type: collect_form
    when_to_call: |
      - 用户想进行八字分析但没有提供出生信息
      - 用户说"帮我算命"但 profile 中没有 birth_info
      - 用户主动要求填写出生信息
    card_props:
      form_fields:
        - name: birth_date
          type: date
          required: true
          label: 出生日期
        - name: birth_time
          type: time
          required: true
          label: 出生时间（时辰）
        - name: birth_location
          type: location
          required: false
          label: 出生地点
        - name: gender
          type: select
          required: true
          label: 性别
          options:
            - value: male
              label: 男
            - value: female
              label: 女
      allow_text_input: true
      text_input_placeholder: 请描述你当前的困惑或问题...
    parameters:
      - name: question
        type: string
        required: false
        description: 用户的问题或困惑
      - name: include_question
        type: boolean
        required: false
        default: true

data.prompt:
我需要探索 VibeLife 项目中 Skill 之间互相调用的当前实现和限制。

背景：用户希望实现复杂场景（如"职场时机"），需要多个 Skill 协同：
- bazi (运势分析)
- zodiac (星象分析)  
- career (职业规划)
- lifecoach (目标追踪)

请帮我探索：

1. **当前限制**：
   - CoreAgent 中 `_active_skill` 是如何管理的？
   - 一次对话中能否激活多个 Skill？
   - Phase 2 执行时，能否调用其他 Skill 的工具？

2. **现有的跨 Skill 能力**：
   - 查找是否有 `requires_skill_data` 配置
   - Skill 是否能读取其他 Skill 的数据（skill_data）？
   - 有没有类似 "sub-skill" 或 "orchestrator" 的模式？

3. **Tool Registry**：
   - `get_tools_for_skill()` 是如何过滤工具的？
   - 是否支持 "global" 工具可被所有 Skill 使用？

4. **潜在方案**：
   - 能否通过修改路由让一个"场景 Skill"调度多个"能力 Skill"？
   - 类似 `career_timing` 这样的新 Skill 如何调用 `bazi.calculate_bazi` 工具？

请提供关键代码路径和架构限制分析。

content.content:
1→"""
     2→Chat Routes V5 - Unified chat endpoint with CoreAgent
     3→Based on: Claude Agent SDK style architecture
     4→
     5→Features:
     6→- Single /chat/stream endpoint
     7→- CoreAgent with LLM-based skill selection
     8→- Quota check at entry + usage recording
     9→- OpenAI compatible SSE format (works with AI SDK 4.x useChat)
    10→- 分阶段渐进式加载（Phase 1: Skill 选择, Phase 2: Skill 执行）
    11→- 历史消息从数据库获取（不依赖前端传入）
    12→
    13→v3.0 更新 (2026-01-20):
    14→- 移除 Protocol 状态管理（改为 LLM 自己管理）
    15→- 添加 scenario 参数支持
    16→- 简化 SSE 事件流
    17→
    18→v2.0 更新 (2026-01-20):
    19→- 删除前端传入 history 机制，改为数据库查询
    20→- 分阶段加载：Phase 1 不加载 profile，Phase 2 按需加载
    21→- use_skill 同轮重载上下文
    22→"""
    23→import json
    24→import logging
    25→import time
    26→from typing import Optional
    27→from uuid import UUID, uuid4
    28→
    29→from fastapi import APIRouter, Depends, Request
    30→from fastapi.responses import StreamingResponse
    31→from slowapi import Limiter
    32→from slowapi.util import get_remote_address
    33→
    34→limiter = Limiter(key_func=get_remote_address)
    35→from pydantic import BaseModel, Field
    36→from sse_starlette.sse import EventSourceResponse
    37→
    38→from services.identity import get_optional_user, CurrentUser
    39→from services.agent import CoreAgent, AgentContext, QuotaTracker, create_agent, get_adapter, AgentEvent
    40→from stores.profile_cache import get_cached_profile_with_skill
    41→from stores import message_repo, conversation_repo
    42→from stores.skill_repo import SkillRepository
    43→
    44→router = APIRouter(prefix="/chat/v5", tags=["Chat V5"])
    45→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    46→
    47→
    48→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    49→# Request/Response Models
    50→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    51→
    52→class MessageItem(BaseModel):
    53→    """Single message in AI SDK format"""
    54→    role: str
    55→    content: str
    56→
    57→
    58→class ChatRequestV5(BaseModel):
    59→    """V5 Chat request - supports both simple and AI SDK format"""
    60→    message: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="User message (simple format)")
    61→    messages: Optional[list[MessageItem]] = Field(None, description="Messages array (AI SDK format, used for user message extraction only)")
    62→    conversation_id: Optional[UUID] = Field(None, description="Conversation ID")
    63→    skill: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Skill ID (bazi/zodiac/career/tarot)")
    64→    scenario: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Scenario/Rule ID (dankoe/covey/weekly-review)")
    65→    voice_mode: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="Voice mode (warm/sarcastic)")
    66→
    67→    def get_user_message(self) -> str:
    68→        """Extract user message from either format"""
    69→        if self.message:
    70→            return self.message
    71→        if self.messages:
    72→            # Get the last user message from the array
    73→            for msg in reversed(self.messages):
    74→                if msg.role == "user":
    75→                    return msg.content
    76→        return ""
    77→
    78→    # 注意：get_history() 已删除，历史消息从数据库获取
    79→
    80→
    81→class GuestChatRequestV5(BaseModel):
    82→    """Guest chat request - supports both simple and AI SDK format"""
    83→    message: Optional[str] = Field(None, description="User message (simple format)")
    84→    messages: Optional[list[MessageItem]] = Field(None, description="Messages array (AI SDK format)")
    85→
    86→    def get_user_message(self) -> str:
    87→        """Extract user message from either format"""
    88→        if self.message:
    89→            return self.message
    90→        if self.messages:
    91→            for msg in reversed(self.messages):
    92→                if msg.role == "user":
    93→                    return msg.content
    94→        return ""
    95→
    96→
    97→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    98→# Helper Functions
    99→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
   100→
   101→async def get_user_context(user_id: Optional[UUID], skill: Optional[str] = None) -> tuple:
   102→    """
   103→    Get user profile and skill data (分阶段加载)
   104→
   105→    v11 更新：
   106→    - Phase 1 (skill=None): 加载轻量画像 (identity + vibe + subscribed_skills)
   107→    - Phase 2 (skill 有值): 加载完整数据 (profile + skill_data)
   108→    """
   109→    if not user_id:
   110→        return {}, {}
   111→
   112→    try:
   113→        if not skill:
   114→            # v11: Phase 1 也加载轻量画像（用于个性化路由）
   115→            vibe_profile = await get_vibe_profile_lite(user_id)
   116→            return vibe_profile, {}
   117→
   118→        # Phase 2: 加载完整数据
   119→        result = await get_cached_profile_with_skill(user_id, skill)
   120→        return result.get("profile", {}), result.get("skill_data", {})
   121→    except Exception as e:
   122→        logger.error(f"Failed to get user context: {e}")
   123→        return {}, {}
   124→
   125→
   126→async def get_vibe_profile_lite(user_id: UUID) -> dict:
   127→    """
   128→    获取轻量 VibeProfile（Phase 1 用）
   129→
   130→    包含：
   131→    - identity (display_name, birth_info)
   132→    - vibe (insight, target)
   133→    - subscribed_skills (已订阅的 Skill ID 列表)
   134→
   135→    约 150 tokens
   136→    """
   137→    from stores.unified_profile_repo import UnifiedProfileRepository
   138→
   139→    try:
   140→        profile = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_profile(user_id)
   141→        if not profile:
   142→            return {}
   143→
   144→        # 获取订阅信息
   145→        subscribed_skills = await UnifiedProfileRepository.get_subscribed_skill_ids(user_id)
   146→
   147→        return {
   148→            "identity": profile.get("identity", {}),
   149→            "vibe": profile.get("vibe", {}),
   150→            "subscribed_skills": subscribed_skills,

1→"""
     2→JungAstro Skill 工具执行器
     3→
     4→架构说明：
     5→- 复用 zodiac skill 的计算服务 (calculate_zodiac)
     6→- 添加荣格心理学解读层 (JungianInterpreter)
     7→- 定义独立的卡片类型 (jungastro_*)
     8→
     9→数据获取方式：
    10→- 从 context.profile 获取用户出生信息
    11→- 从 context.skill_data 获取已计算的星盘数据
    12→- 调用 zodiac 的计算函数进行实时计算
    13→"""
    14→
    15→import logging
    16→from datetime import datetime
    17→from typing import Dict, Any, Optional
    18→
    19→from services.agent.tool_registry import tool_handler, ToolContext
    20→
    21→logger = logging.getLogger(__name__)
    22→
    23→
    24→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    25→# 服务层导入 - 复用 zodiac 计算能力
    26→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    27→
    28→def get_zodiac_chart(context: ToolContext) -> Optional[Dict[str, Any]]:
    29→    """
    30→    从 context 获取用户星盘数据
    31→
    32→    优先级：
    33→    1. context.skill_data["zodiac"]["chart"] - 已计算的完整星盘
    34→    2. 使用 birth_info 实时计算
    35→    """
    36→    profile = context.profile or {}
    37→    skill_data = context.skill_data or {}
    38→
    39→    # 优先从 skill_data 读取已计算的星盘
    40→    zodiac_data = skill_data.get("zodiac", {})
    41→    if zodiac_data.get("chart"):
    42→        return zodiac_data["chart"]
    43→
    44→    # 否则尝试实时计算
    45→    identity = profile.get("identity", {})
    46→    birth_info = identity.get("birth_info", {})
    47→    birth_date = birth_info.get("date")
    48→
    49→    if not birth_date:
    50→        return None
    51→
    52→    try:
    53→        from skills.zodiac.services import calculate_zodiac
    54→        chart = calculate_zodiac(
    55→            birth_date=birth_date,
    56→            birth_time=birth_info.get("time", "12:00"),
    57→            birth_place=birth_info.get("place", "Shanghai")
    58→        )
    59→        return chart
    60→    except Exception as e:
    61→        logger.error(f"Failed to calculate zodiac chart: {e}")
    62→        return None
    63→
    64→
    65→def get_jungian_interpreter():
    66→    """获取荣格心理解读器"""
    67→    try:
    68→        from skills.jungastro.services.interpreter import JungianInterpreter
    69→        return JungianInterpreter()
    70→    except ImportError:
    71→        logger.warning("JungianInterpreter not available")
    72→        return None
    73→
    74→
    75→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    76→# 工具执行器
    77→# ═══════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════════
    78→
    79→@tool_handler("collect_birth_info")
    80→async def handle_collect_birth_info(args: Dict[str, Any], context: ToolContext) -> Dict[str, Any]:
    81→    """收集用户出生信息用于荣格心理占星分析"""
    82→    fields = [
    83→        {"id": "birthDate", "label": "出生日期", "type": "date", "required": True, "placeholder": ""},
    84→        {"id": "birthTime", "label": "出生时间", "type": "time", "required": True, "placeholder": ""},
    85→        {"id": "birthPlace", "label": "出生地点", "type": "location", "required": True, "placeholder": "城市名"},
    86→    ]
    87→
    88→    return {
    89→        "status": "collecting",
    90→        "cardType": "collect_form",
    91→        "formType": "birth_info",
    92→        "title": "请填写出生信息",
    93→        "description": "准确的出生信息是进行荣格心理占星分析的基础",
    94→        "fields": fields,
    95→    }
    96→
    97→
    98→@tool_handler("show_psychological_portrait")
    99→async def handle_show_psychological_portrait(
   100→    args: Dict[str, Any],
   101→    context: ToolContext
   102→) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   103→    """
   104→    展示心理画像 - V7 委托模式
   105→
   106→    复用 zodiac 计算器获取星盘数据，
   107→    然后用 JungianInterpreter 进行心理学解读。
   108→    """
   109→    from services.agent.tool_registry import ToolRegistry
   110→
   111→    focus = args.get("focus", "full")
   112→
   113→    # 1. 获取用户星盘数据
   114→    chart_data = get_zodiac_chart(context)
   115→
   116→    if not chart_data:
   117→        return {
   118→            "status": "error",
   119→            "error": "需要出生信息才能进行心理画像分析",
   120→            "action": "collect_birth_info"
   121→        }
   122→
   123→    # 2. 荣格心理解读
   124→    portrait = {
   125→        "ego": _analyze_ego(chart_data),           # 太阳分析
   126→        "unconscious": _analyze_unconscious(chart_data),  # 月亮分析
   127→        "persona": _analyze_persona(chart_data),   # 上升分析
   128→        "functions": _analyze_functions(chart_data),  # 功能分布
   129→    }
   130→
   131→    # 3. 如果有解读器，使用更深度的分析
   132→    interpreter = get_jungian_interpreter()
   133→    if interpreter:
   134→        portrait = interpreter.analyze_psychological_portrait(chart_data, focus)
   135→
   136→    logger.info(f"Showing psychological portrait via show_card for user {context.user_id}")
   137→
   138→    return await ToolRegistry.execute(
   139→        "show_card",
   140→        {
   141→            "card_type": "custom",
   142→            "data_source": {"type": "inline", "data": portrait},
   143→            "options": {"componentId": "jungastro_portrait"}
   144→        },
   145→        context
   146→    )
   147→
   148→
   149→@tool_handler("show_shadow_analysis")
   150→async def handle_show_shadow_analysis(
   151→    args: Dict[str, Any],
   152→    context: ToolContext
   153→) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   154→    """
   155→    展示阴影分析 - V7 委托模式
   156→
   157→    分析困难相位、冥王星配置、12宫内容等。
   158→    """
   159→    from services.agent.tool_registry import ToolRegistry
   160→
   161→    chart_data = get_zodiac_chart(context)
   162→
   163→    if not chart_data:
   164→        return {
   165→            "status": "error",
   166→            "error": "需要出生信息才能进行阴影分析",
   167→            "action": "collect_birth_info"
   168→        }
   169→
   170→    shadow = {
   171→        "difficult_aspects": _find_difficult_aspects(chart_data),
   172→        "pluto_analysis": _analyze_pluto(chart_data),
   173→        "twelfth_house": _analyze_twelfth_house(chart_data),
   174→        "saturn_analysis": _analyze_saturn(chart_data),
   175→        "shadow_patterns": [],
   176→        "integration_path": ""
   177→    }
   178→
   179→    logger.info(f"Showing shadow analysis via show_card for user {context.user_id}")
   180→
   181→    return await ToolRegistry.execute(
   182→        "show_card",
   183→        {
   184→            "card_type": "custom",
   185→            "data_source": {"type": "inline", "data": shadow},
   186→            "options": {"componentId": "jungastro_shadow"}
   187→        },
   188→        context
   189→    )
   190→
   191→
   192→@tool_handler("show_individuation_path")
   193→async def handle_show_individuation_path(
   194→    args: Dict[str, Any],
   195→    context: ToolContext
   196→) -> Dict[str, Any]:
   197→    """
   198→    展示个体化路径 - V7 委托模式
